offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: RIR PHYSICAL INJURY A cellphone call was received from concerned citizen informing this station through Governor Generoso hotline that there was vehicular incident transpired at Purok 4 Poblacion Governor Generoso Davao Oriental Team led by PMSg Teodoro Blaya Duty investigator under the direct supervision of PMAJ MARVIE P SINGAYAN ACOP left this office onboard mobile partol driven by PSSg Tomica to verify the veracity of the report Investigation conducted disclosed that Wilfredo Rabado Gastrado 64 years old male and a resident of Brgy La Union San Isidro Davao Oriental was driving a single motorcycle Hnda Wave 110 color black gray with plate no 3347NN traersing from Brgy Tibanban going to Brgy La Union when upon reaching at Purok 4 Brgy Poblacion accidentally bumped Manuelita Espernza Elrango 72 years old female and a resident of Purok 9 Brgy Poblacion as a result victim sustain injuries and was brought to the nearest hospital

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: RIR PHYSICAL INJURIES A concern citizen called this station through a cellphone hotline of this station informing that there was a vehicular incident transpired at Bgry Nangan of this municipality and all the victims and the driver of a single motor were all on board the Municipal Risk Reduction Center vehicle and others onboard the vehicle of Brgy Nangan were rushed to Governor Generoso hospital Acted on the said PNP personnel of this station PMSg Teodoro L Blaya Duty investigator under the direct supervision of PMAJ MARVIE P SINGAYAN ACOP left this office onboard mobile patrol with body no 745 driven by PSSg Tomica bound to the said place for verification Investigation conducted disclosed that there was a disco held at Purok 1 Brgy Nangan of this municipality after the event Joshua Pama Morales 19 years old single male and a resident of Brgy Nangan on board single motor cycle Euro 150 with no plate number accidentally bumped another motorcycle Euro 125 color black driven by Abel Gatdula 20 years old single and a his backrider Kian Kasilagan 21 years old male both resident of Brgy Pundaguitan of this municipality Also Valentino Labitan Jonathan Fuentes April John Berido and Ranoel Palma all residents Brgy Nangan while walking the street were also hit by the victim All were rushed to the hospital for immediate medication

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: Investigation revealed that vehicle was traveling from Belsonda Madang Central going to Menzi Don Martin Marundan all in Mati City Upon reaching the abovementioned TDPO vehicle accidentally bumped the said pedestrian who was crossing the road And as a result vehicle incurred damage while pedestrian fell down on the road and suffered injuries Pedestrian was brought to DOPMC for immediate medical treatment Said vehicle together with the driver were temporarily held at this station for further investigation The driver license of Noe N Canoy driver will be forwarded to Mati LTO for the violation of RA 4136 reckless driving

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO HOMICIDE - RPC Art 365
narrative: Republic of the Philippines National Police Commission PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE Davao Oriental Police Provincial Office MATI CITY POLICE STATION City of Mati Davao Oriental SLLIUT rn Lh MEMORANDUM FOR Provincial Director Davao Oriental Police Provincial Office Brgy Dahican City of Mati Attn C PIB IDMS C OPN FROM Chief of Police SUBJECT Report on Road Crash Incident DATE February 27 2023 A 1 References A Official blotter entry no 0893 of page 0215 dated February 27 2023 B Standard Operaing Procedure 2 In relation with the above reference please be inform that at about 5 30 PM of February 27 2023 PLTCOL Ernesto M Gregore COP received an information that there was a road crash incident at Prk 9 Brgy Mamali Mati City Immediately duty traffic investigator PSSg Doylabo and PCpl David proceeded to the said place to conduct ocular investigation 3 Initial investigation conducted disclosed that at about 4 45 PM of February 27 2023 a road crash incident has transpired at the street of Prk 9 Brgy Mamali Mati City Davao Oriental involving of three vehicles described as follows V1 Motorstar motorcycle bearing chassis no LXJXJHLAXJB47360 and engine no 152FMU18A19234 driven by Alejandro Blaga 60 years old male fisherman a resident of Prk 10 Brgy Mamali Mati City with one back rider identified as Alijo N Blaga 5 years old male son of the driver V2 Rusi motorcycle bearing chassis no LB2TCJ486NG065276 and engine no 1P52QM1N06G65276 owned by Sarah Espinosa a resident of Prk 9 Brgy Mamali Mati City y V3 Jeep bearing plate no LAH 865 owned by Anting Garing a resident of Brgy Dawan Mati City y 4 That the V1 was traveling from Brgy Mamali proper headi Mamali Mati City On the said TDPO V1 swerved out the lane then rammed into V2 and V3 who were parked along the road side As a result driver and back ride and both vehicles incurred damage rider of V1 suffered severe injuries 5 Said injured person were rushed to Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital for immediate medical treatment but the attending physician Dr Ronald Robinos pronounced minor Alijo N Blaga dead on arrival 6 Furthermore driver of V1 believed to be under influence of intoxicated li our 7 V1 is now under custody of this station for proper disposition 8 For information I0C PCpl Jhon Karlo M David 09518466321

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO HOMICIDE - RPC Art 365
narrative: At about 10 50 PM of March 5 2023 RPSB personnel led by PMSG Rondy Valeriano brought one living body identified as Reymark Manlucob Pagkiasan male 20 years old single CAFGU a resident of Old Macopa Manay Davao Oriental and detailed as security at the residence of Barangay Captain of Barangay Don Salvador Lopez Mati City who was allegedly involved on a road crash incident transpired at Ligaran 3 Barangay Don Salvador Lopez Mati City Further duty traffic investigators PSSg Cristopher John Doylabo and PCpl Maria Sol B Dahilig conducted an investigation 3 Initial investigation conducted revealed that on or about 6 30 PM of March 5 2023 a road crash incident has transpired at the street of Purok Ligaran 3 Barangay Don Salvador Lopez Mati City fronting the residence of Brgy Captain Benrio Miones Accordingly Reymark Manlucob Pagkiasan was driving a HONDA CRF motorcycle and Precilo Bauyot Amado male 44 years old married farmer and a resident of Cangusan Barangay DSL Mati City who was driving a HONDA TMX motorcycle with one back rider identified as Ranilo Awit Bucar male 44 years old common law husband and a resident of Cangusan Barangay DSL Mati City 4 Said HONDA TMX motorcycle was travelling from Mati City proper heading towards the aforesaid driver s resident Upon reaching at the above mentoned place of incident bumped head on into the oncoming HONDA CRF As a result of the collision Precilo Bauyot Amado and Ranilo Awit Bucar sustained injuries and was brought by the Barangay DSL rescuers together with RPSB personnel to Davao Oriental Provincial Medical Center DOPMC for medical treatment 5 At around 7 15 PM of the same date Dr Gerald Mar Rañeses pronounce Ranilo Awit Bucar dead on arrival and now his cadaver lies at Pavilona Funeral Home of Barangay Central Mati City 6 The place of ocurrence is almost 20km distance away from this station and upon verification thereat the two involved motorcycles was no where to be found and believed to be hidden by their relatives 7 For information and progress report will follow IOC PSSg Cristopher John Doylabo and Pat Maria Sol Dahilig 09855731337

narrative: At 3 20 PM of the same date Team led by PSSg Richel F Tanjay investigator left this station bound to the said place to verify the veracity of the report 4 At around 5 20 PM Team returned station with Initial investigation report that at around 3 10 PM dated March 6 2023 V1 A Honda CFT125 MSE color red and white bearing Temporary plate number MV File 1101 00000320683 Certificate of Registration no 269608673 and Official Receipt no 2194394311 driven by a certain D1 Dexter Batulan Carmilotes 24 years old single a Credit Investigator collector of Greater RJ and a resident of Prk Makugihon 2 Brgy Batobato San Isidro Davao Oriental with Professional Driver s License no L07 19 003147 and will expire on 2023 12 04 bound to Prk Daisy Brgy Baon SIDO and upon reaching the National Highway of the same place he signal his motorcycle to left turn afterwards he was bump from behind and fell off on the right sideway by a V2 SUV LX AT 4 model 2014 color black bearing plate number AKA4827 with Certificate of Registration no 283855880 and Official Receipt no 1128 000000050991 driven by D2 Cleo Llyod Pandac Maslog 27 years old single Philipiine Coastguard and a resident of Prk Santan Tibanban Governor Generoso Davao Oriental with Drivers Lincense no L07 18 002214 and will expire on 2032 11 30 traversing coming from Brgy Manikling San Isidro Davao Oriental bound to Governor Generoso afterwards the said vehicle hit the moving motorcycle at the other side of the lane V3 Raider 150 color Blue driven by D3 Rex Maumbas Casanaan 27 years old married Pera Hub collector and a resident of Prk Pag asa Lower Salazar Central Mati City Davao Oriental with Professional Driver s License no L07 16 000721 hitting the Right side headlight of V2 as a result of the collision the V2 car turns spun in the other side of the lane both drivers of the Motorcycle was rush to the Lupon Provincial Hospital Davao Oriental by MDRRMC San Isidro for immediate medical attention it was found out later that D1 sustained minor injuries but the D3 was pronounce Dead of Arrival DOA by the attending physician Dr Jude Carlo Muca MD the vehicles involved in the incident and the D2 is now on this police protective custody for proper disposition IOC Richel F Tanjay 0968852259

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: RIR PHYSICAL INJURY Louie Gallego from radio room called this office informing that there was an alleged vehicular incident transpired at Brgy Nangan of this municipality ICOW responding PNP personnel arrived at this office and initial investigation conducted disclosed that V tricyle Kawasaki Bajaj 150 color black with plate no 122QL was driven by Eldo Salimbajon 41 years old married and a resident of Brgy Surop and V2 single motorcycle XRM 110 color black and a resident of Purok 1 Brgy Tiblawan Gov Generoso that while both vehicles traversing the national road when V2 accidentally traversed the lane of V1 and bumped from behind causing injuries to V1 driver and passenger and damage to the tricycle V2 driver also sustained injuries and believed to be under the influence of liquor Both drivers and passenger were immediately brought to the hospital for medication

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO HOMICIDE - RPC Art 365
narrative: Initial investigation disclosed that at about 9 55 PM of March 26 2023 a road crash incident was transpired at GSIS Street Barangay Dahican Mati City involving one Rusi motorcycle no plate number attach bearing chassis number RFCPCKXJ0MB023450 and engine number PF162FMJM06023450 driven by Jerson A Barles 23 years old single laborer a resident of Purok Lower Cabuyawan San Victor Baganga Davao Oriental with one unidentified back rider Investigation revealed that said motorcycle was traveling from Magsaysay Barangay Central going to Barangay Bobon both in Mati City Upon reaching at abovementioned place of incident it accidentally fell on the road that resulted to an injuries sustained by the driver and back rider The driver and back rider were brought by Mati CDRRMC personnel to Davao Oriental Provincial Medical Center DOPMC for medical treatment The said back rider is unconcious and unable to speak due to his head injury while the said driver was seemingly under influence of intoxicated liquor base on his alcoholic breath

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO MULTIPLE PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: Initial investigation revealed that V2 was travelling from Marayag Lupon heading towards Toril Davao del Sur while V1 was coming from Belsonda Brgy Central of this city Upon reaching the aforesaid TDPO V1 who was traversing on the shouldering of the road crosses and enters the lane of V2 Consequently V2 bumped the left hand side of V1 As a result of the collision both motorcycles fell on the concrete pavement injuring both drivers and their back riders The V1 driver and his two back riders were brought to DOPMC for immediate medical treatment

narrative: RIR DAMAGE TO PROPERTY A team of this station led by PMSg Eric Estillore together with PMSg Teodoro L Blaya Duty Investigator and onboard mobile patrol driven by PSSg Tomica left this station to conduct mobile patrol police visibility at Brgy Manuel Roxas in this municipality Upon arrival at the intersection of Sigaboy Cemetery Brgy Poblacion in this municipality a vehicular incident involved one motorcycle and one car Thereafter personnel at this station immediately conducted a vehicular investigation Personnel arrived at this office with vehicular investigation report disclosed that one 1 single motor Euro 155 color black with chassis no LP7PCKL25M1004590 driven by Edric Donaldo Matinagnos 23 years old single male and a resident of P 4 Brgy Sergio Osmeña of this municipality and one 1 passenger Cristin Joy Bariquatro Nudalo 20 years old single female and a resident of Dahlia 1 Brgy Tibanban of this municipality and no driver s license and OR CR document presented represented as Vehicle one 1 And Henry Carlo Suico Dejillo 29 years old married male and a resident of Seira Madre St Central Park Bangkal Davao City with driver s license no LO7 22 000159 Expiration date 2026 09 17 Agency code LO7 DL code B driven a car Mitsubishi Mirage G4 GLX1 Body Type Sedan with Plate no LAK 4524 and Engine nr 3A92UKM4496 owned by Dominique S Dejillo a resident of Lot 19 Central Park Bangkal Davao City represented to Vehicle two 2 Facts The V1 traversed the National Highway of Brgy Tibanban in this municipality going to Brgy Sergio Osmeña this municipality and the V2 from Sigaboy Cemetery traverses the road of the cemetery going to Davao City Upon reaching the intersection of the National Highway the V2 vehicle turned right going to Davao City V1 and V2 upon reaching the said intersection were accidentally bumped by V1 hitting the left mirror on the driver s side The V2 vehicle was dragged 5 meters from the original point of impact and the V1 vehicle oust 10 meters from the original point of impact resulting in the driver and his passenger being thrown in the outer lane in the opposite lane Which resulted in the driver and passenger of V1 sustaining injuries Both vehicles V1 and V2 resulted in unestimated damages The driver and passenger of V1 were brought to Governor Generoso Provincial Hospital for medical treatment

narrative: DOPMFC personnel from Brgy San Ignacio Patrol base called through the hotline of this station reporting a vehicular accident at Brgy San Ignacio Manay Davao Oriental In connection to blotter entry number 2023 05 3526 team led by PSMS Joselito M Gomera duty investigator was dispatched to verify the report and conduct investigation In connection to blotter entry number 2023 05 3527 same team returned station and revealed that at about 6 40 AM May 30 2023 Victoio Televes Longyapon 62 years old married resident of Purok Tiago Brgy San Ignacio Manay holder of professional driver s license with license number L07 82 005861 with restrictions 1 2 3 that expires on April 21 2024 was driving his Mitsubishi Adventure GLS wagon bearing plate number AAG 6719 V1 while trying to cross to his lane heading Municiapality of Tarragona from being parked at the opposite lane particularly at Purok Villalobos Brgy Central Manay was accidentally bumped by a Kawasaki CT 100 Bajaj motorcycle with sidecar tricycle without plate number attached V2 driven by Julendo Mangopot Gantes 31 years old married driver and a resident of Purok Narra Brgy Holy Cross Manay Davao Oriental Investigation further revealed that V1 driver had signaled V2 driver that he will cross the highway but V2 driver did not notice V1 because he was looking at his passenger and bumped at the left side rear bumper of V1 no injuries on both driver and passengers of V2 V1 incurred damages at the left side bumper and its body while V2 incurred minor damage on its front wheel Both drivers and their vehicles was brought to Brgy Hall of Brgy San Ignacio as per request of both parties together with Jezebelle Mas Salianon 48 years old single and a resident of Sitio Tapaok Brgy Holy Cross Manay the owner of V2 that they will just settle the damages and they had signed an agreement for the cost of the repair on the damages of V1 Both vehicles and its credential was released back to the driver owner For record

narrative: Initial investigation conducted that a road crash incident has transfired at Rizal Street Crossing Rural Bank Brgy Central Mati City at about 3 30 AM of May 7 2023 involving two vehicles described as follows V1 Mitsubishi Xpander bearing plate no LAG 9561 driven by Rea Francis C Castillo 26 years old single female a resident of NHA Village Brgy Dahican Mati City V2 Mitsukoshi Motorcycle bearing plate no L965 AV driven by Edy A Macaraan Jr 54 years old male married a resident of Prk Mabiga Brgy Lucatan Tarragona Davao Orietal with his wife as back rider named Arlene L Macaran 50 years old That V1 was traveling from Baywalk going to Sitio Mapantad Brgy Sainz of this city while V2 was traveling from Lucatan Tarragona going to Mati City Public Market On the said time date and place of occurrence the right side rear portion of V1 bumped by V2 which resulted V2 fell on the road The driver and back rider of V2 suffered injuries and both vehicles incurred damage Further back rider of V2 was rushed by Mati CDRRMO personnel to DOPMC for treatment and later driver of V2 was taken by responding PNP personnel to DOPMC for treatment also Moreover after the incident V1 tried to escape but one concerned citizen named Rodel C Dela Cerna chased and cornered her at Mapantad Brgy Sainz Mati City and they went back at the place of incident During interview driver of V1 Rea Francis C Castillo believed to be under the influence of intoxicated liquor base on alcoholic breath red eyes and slurred speech The driver and Back rider of V2 were conscious but Arlene Macaraan was positive in Rapid Test for COVID 19 The V1 Rea Francis C Castillo and V2 are now under custody of this station for proper disposition IOC PSSg Doylabo PSSg Añedez and PCpl Pacalioga 09298730710

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO MULTIPLE HOMICIDE - RPC Art 365
narrative: At around 06 30 PM of July 12 2023 call received by this station informing that there was a vehicular accident transpired at Sumlog Bridge prk Matinabangun Brgy Corporacion Lupon Davao Oriental Immediately personnel from this station led by PCPL Manzor T Alilian Traffic Investigator left this office to verify the veracity of the report and to conduct ocular investigation At around 06 37pm arrived at the place wherein victim identified as Marvin R Villanueva 42 yrs old single a resident of Purok Site Brgy Corporacion Lupon Davao Oriental The victim was attended for medical treatment by the MDRRMC personnel and was rushed to Lupon DOPH but declared as dead on arrival by Dr Ferdinand R Araune the attending Physician Initial investigation disclosed that vehicles involved one 1 Toyota Hilux Pick up color white as v 1 with plate number NFX9563 driven by Sabang Noel Areja 48 yrs old a resident of Prk Yusaville Sinawal Gen Santos City and one 1 MC Honda CFT 125 color black gray as v 2 with plate Number 462LHC driven by Villanueva Marvin Roble 42 yrs old single a resident of Prk Site Brgy Corporacion Lupon Davao Oriental Initial investigation revealed that v 1 is traversing the National highway of lupon heading towards mati city while v 2 is came from Brgy Limbahan heading to Barol Brgy Corporacion of this municipality wherein V 2 is passing the sumlog bridge upon reaching the said place of incident v 1 from opposite direction was about to enter the said bridge v 1 thought it was a single carriageway with a double lane so he decided to take the left lane not knowing that he was already countering the flow from v 2 after v 1 seeing that he is about to collide with v 2 he managed to apply the brakes but unfortunately hit v 2 as a result v 2 driver together with backride passenger incurred damage and injuries Furthermore both driver and passenger from v 2 were immediately rushed to the LUPON DOPH but suddenly the driver was declared as dead on arrival by Dr Ferdinand R Araune the attending Physician and the passenger still under observation Vehicle involved was brought to this station together with the driver of v 1 for proper dispostion

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO HOMICIDE - RPC Art 365
narrative: A phone call received thru mobile hotline at about 6 30 PM of July 30 2023 this station received a cellular phone call coming from a concerned citizen informing that there was a vehicular accident transpired along National Highway of Purok Masipag A Sitio Baculinay Brgy Ban ao Baganga Davao Oriental and that the victim was already brought to Baganga Municipal Hospital on board a white pick up truck offered by a concerned citizen In connection blotter entry no 2023 07 438 PNP personnel of this station led by PSSg Daniel B Flores Team Leader together with PSSg Clyde Y Drona Asst Traffic Investigator immediately proceeded to Baganga Municipal Hospital for verification and thereafter went to the place of the accident for further investigation Same PNP personnel returned to this station with Investigation disclosed that at around 5 00 PM of July 30 2023 KIM TOLOMIA ESTANIEL driver 19 years old male and a resident of Purok 20 Nursery Compostela Davao De Oro driven his black SkyGo KING150 no plate number attached while traversing the road coming from his residence Compostela Davao De Oro going to Baganga Davao Oriental but upon reaching the place of incident National Highway of Purok Masipag A Sitio Baculinay Brgy Ban ao Baganga Davao Oriental DOMINGO SEREÑO AMPIDAN victim 80 years old male married senior citizen and a resident of Purok Masipag A Sitio Baculinay Brgy Ban ao Baganga Davao Oriental walked along the National Highway particularly at the outer lane going to Cateel Baganga road and instantly turned about heading back to his direction now walking in the middle of inner and outer lane which resulted the said victim being bumped by the said incoming single motorcycle However at around 6 10 PM of July 30 2023 the said victim was declared Dead on Arrival DOA by the attending physical by Dr Cristian Roy D Palmera RN MD The lifeless body of the victim now lies at the Morales Funeral Homes while the driver and his driven motorcycle is now under the custody of this station for proper disposition while case is being prepared for filing

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: ICOW preceding blotter entry no 2023 08 5092 team returned to station with an information and it disclosed that both parties were completely identified as one 1 Toyota Vios V1 bearing plate number NBE 8599 driven by Pat Eliel Glen C Salvaña D1 31 years old bonafide member of PNP presently assigned at Governor Generoso Police Station and one 1 EURO 150 V2 color black NO PLATE NUMBER ATTACHED having chassis number LF3PCK501MB806272 driven by Christian Robles D2 minor 16 years old and a resident of Bilawan 2 Barangay Central Mati City together with his two 2 back ride Jeron B Serdan and Jeffrey D Veray Initial Investigation conducted disclosed that upon arrival at the scene both vehicles were already moved by both drivers thereby the investigator cannot conclude where the point of origin impact had happened Therefore the investigation relies on its witnesses therein Based on their statements both vehicles VI and V2 were traveling in the same direction Eventually this V2 has no tail light or headlight that could illuminate his roadway for safe driving Then upon reaching the place of the incident this V1 without any intention and due to rainy conditions did not see the presence of V2 hence resulting in their collision As a consequence thereof D2 was thrown out from his driven motorcycle and slammed on the concrete pavement road thereby sustaining injuries and now recuperating at Lupon Lupon District Hospital while his passengers were in stable condition On the other hand Pat Eliel Glen C Salvaña did not sustain any injuries in this incident Moreover both vehicles are now held in this police office for protective custody over the body of the crime IOC PCpl Jessie Mar Lazaga

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO HOMICIDE - RPC Art 365
narrative: As per references at about 1 40 PM of August 22 2023 a concerned citizen personally appeared to this station informing that there is a Vehicular Accident Transpired at Sitio Papag Barangay Poblacion Caraga Davao Oriental Upon receipt of information PNP personnel of this station together with the duty investigator left this station bound to the reported place of incident Investigation conducted disclosed that at about 1 30 PM of August 22 2023 vehicular accident transpired at the aforesaid mentioned place Vehicle V1 Toyota Van color white bearing plate no LDP 2012 chassis no JTFJT02PXG5003949 registered under the name of Joeber Estanislao Tesoy and driven by Alpha Mie Timosa Villa 24 years old born on December 30 1999 male single driver and a resident of Mati City Davao Oriental a possessor of professional driver license no L07 23 000471 and will expired on December 30 2027 while traversing from Baganga Davao Oriental to Mati City upon approaching the curved portion of Sitio Papag Brgy Poblacion Caraga Davao Oriental National Highway met and accident when the V2 RUSI Motor 150 color red no plate no attached with chassis no RFCPCKXJ4NY058491 with no driver s license and motorcycle documents presented driven by Gilbert Campomayor Sumaliling Jr 18 years old born on May 25 2005 male single student and a resident of Brgy San Miguel Caraga Davao Oriental while V2 traversing from his residence to Caraga Davao Oriental Proper upon approaching of said curved portion place allegedly V2 was on the lane of V1 which prompting V1 swerve from the other lane to avoid collision but unfortunately V2 returned to his lane which it collided with each other As a result the victim sustained major injuries and immediately brought to Municipal Health Center for immediate medical attention and later referred to Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital for medical treatment Further the suspect and both vehicles which incurred un estimated cost of damage and are in the custody of this for proper disposition Investigation of this case is ongoing and progress report to follow investigator in case is PSSg Julem B Maynagcot with contact no 09213387380

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO HOMICIDE - RPC Art 365
narrative: please be informed that at about 2 10 PM A mobile phone call from MDRRMO was received by this station informing about a Vehicular Incident transpired along the national highway of Purok Anahaw Barangay Batobato San Isidro Davao Oriental involving a Toyota Innova and a single motorcycle Upon receipt of information duty Traffic investigator immediately proceeded to the above mentioned place to verify the veracity of the said report as well as to conduct ocular traffic investigation 3 Information gathered during the ocular investigation both parties were completely identified as one 1 Toyota Innova V1 bearing plate number MAX8818 driven by Lorenie M Jabagato D1 28 years old single and a resident of Purok Tumalite Barangay La Union San Isidro Davao Oriental and one 1 RS Honda 125 V2 color red and black bearing MV File no 1101 01095819 having chassis number KPG20067607 driven by Diomedes Clemente D2 60 years old and a resident of Purok Anahaw Barangay Batobato San Isidro Davao Oriental together with his Son Wyne Tristhan Deo Clemente Initial Investigation conducted disclosed that both vehicles were traveling in the same direction This V2 using the slow lane tried to transfer on the opposite side of the road with proper hand and light signaled prior thereon this claim is supported by a statement of the witness named Marlo Marzado Unwittingly with a very short distance from V1 this V2 encroached into the fast lane going to the opposite side of the road from where his house was located With all the means undertaken by V1 then and there she still bumps V2 from behind As a consequence thereof D2 and his back ride were thrown out from their motorcycle and slammed on the concrete pavement road thereby sustaining injuries Immediately thereafter both of them were brought to Lupon District Hospital for immediate medical attention However D2 Diomedes Clemente was declared dead on arrival by his attending physician while his back ride is now in stable condition yet still recuperating at the said hospital On the other hand the driver of Toyota Innova did not sustain any injuries in this incident Moreover both vehicles are now held in this police office for protective custody over the body of the crime The case for violation of Reckless Imprudence Resulting to Homicide with Physical Injuries and Damage to Property under Article 365 in relation to Article 263 of the Revised Penal Code is now being readied by this office for inquest proceedings A progress Report will follow IOC PCpl Jessie Mar Lazaga

narrative: INITIAL INVESTIGATION CONDUCTED DISCLOSED THAT BOTH VEHICLES TRAVELLING WITH SAME DIRECTION WHICH V1 LEAD 1ST FOLLOWED BY V2 UPON REACHING THE ABOVEMENTIONED PLACE OF INCIDENT THE LEFT SIDE PORTION OF V1 HIT THE RIGHT SIDE MUFFLER PORTION OF V2 WHILE V1 MANAGE TO OVERTAKE AS A RESULT THEREOF V2 FELL ON THE ROAD BOTH VEHICLES INCURRED UN ESTIMATED DAMAGES WHILE DRIVER OF V2 SUSTAIN MINOR INJURIES AND WERE RUSH TO DOPMC HOSPITAL BY CDRRMO PERSONNEL FOR MEDICAL TREATMENT BOTH VEHICLES WERE BROUGHT TO THIS STATION FOR PROPER DISPOSITION

narrative: SKYGO TRICYCLE BEARING PLATE NO LD 29753 DRIVEN BY RENATO H MANTO 51 YO MALE MARRIED DRIVER A RESIDENT OF PRK TATE ACACIA PH 7 MARTINEZ SUBD BRGY DAHICAN MATI CITY AND TOYOTA HIACE VAN BEARING PLATE NO UBI 280 DRIVEN BY RICKY M MACALINAO 57 YO MARRIED DRIVER A RESIDENT OF PRK 3 BATO ST BRGY CENTRAL MANAY DAVAO ORIENTAL WITH ONE PASSENGER IDENTIFIED AS DARIN T UNTOWA 29YO INITIAL INVESTIGATION CONDUCTED THAT V1 SKYGO TRICYCLE WAS TRAVELING FROM BRGY HALL OF BRGY DAHICAN GOING TO MARTINEZ WHILE V2 TOYOTA VAN TRAVELING FROM MANAY GOING TO MATI TERMINAL UPON REACHING THE ABOVE MENTIONED TIME DATE AND PLACE OF OCCURRENCE THE LEFT SIDE PORTION OF V2 AND THE RIGHT SIDE PORTION OF V1 ACCIDENTALLY COLLIDED WHEN V1 ENTERED THE LINE OF V2 AS A CONSEQUENCE THEREOF BOTH VEHICLES INCURRED DAMAGES WHILE DRIVER OF V1 SUFFER PAIN AND WAS BROUGHT TO DOPMC FOR MEDICAL TREATMENT

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: Reference Blotter Entry number 8653 At around 06 40 pm of September 3 2023 a call from a concerned citizen was received by this office informing that there was an alleged Road Crash Collision transpired at the National Highway of Brgy Bagumbayan Lupon Davao Oriental Immediately personnel from this station led by PSMS Kristian Leigh R Austria Traffic Investigator left this station to verify the veracity of the report and to conduct ocular investigation At around 06 45 pm of the same date personnel arrived at the place and recovered two 2 vehicles One 1 Fuso Truck bearing plate no RFL 188 color Red 1990 model with Official Receipt No 1136 285976 dated 08 08 2023 Certificate of Registration No 291552586 dated 01 12 2013 owned by Roger Celebrado Moran driven by Romnick Sancala legal age single with PDL no CO7 15 008697 valid until 2027 05 31 a resident of Prk 5 Brgy San Antonio Municipality of Mabini Davao de Oro and One 1 Honda Mc bearing plate no IU4987 driven by Emegdio G Picarra Jr 53 year old Filipino widower farmer without drivers license presented a resident of Purok Bagong Silang Brgy Bagumbayan Lupon Davao Oriental Initial investigation disclosed that while the driver of the motorcycle not wearing a helmet traversing from the National Highway of Brgy Bagumbayan heading to Municipality of Banaybanay upon reaching Purok Macopa of the same Brgy the driver collided with the Fuso truck in a side swiped collision hitting the left outer tire of the said truck Due to the impact the motorcycle swerved on the road which caused injury to the driver and damage to the motorcycle and the outer tire of the truck The victim was brought to Lupon Provincial Hospital by the MDRRMC personnel of Lupon for medical treatment and referred to Tagum Provincial Hospital Motor vehicle and its driver and the motorcycle were brought to this station for document verification and proper disposition

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO MULTIPLE HOMICIDE - RPC Art 365
narrative: ICOW preceding blotter entry no team returned to station with Information gathered during an initial investigation disclosed that at about 1 05 AM of September 3 2023 at the aforementioned place a vehicular accident transpired involving Motoposh single MC herein referred to as V1 no plate number attached driven by Adnan Pangasate Famor male 25 y o single construction worker with Passengers identified as 1 Gilbert Pangasate male 24 y o single jobless 2 Eugen Amodia Mamac male 23y o single laborer 3 Waren Suralta Amodia male 22 y o married jobless and all riders were residents of Purok Cuabo Barangay Manikling San Isidro Davao Oriental And Howo Transit Mixer Truck herein referred to as V2 bearing plate number MAO 2306 driven by Benhar Escorel Agga male 37 y o married driver by profession and resident of Purok Bitoon Barangay Talisay san isidro Davao Oriental He has his buddy named Junrey Camarquez Paredes 53 y o single driver by profession and resident of Purok Bitoon Barangay Talisay San Isidro Davao Oriental Investigation disclosed that the place of the accident the highway is four lanes straight and unlighted V1 was traversing from Barangay Batobato to their home from south to north direction According to Waren Suralta Amodia the passenger revealed that they were drunk with intoxicating alcohol while rodes to their MC and their Single MC had no headlights And D1 drives their Single MC fast Upon reaching the place of the accident they bumped behind V2 which half way parked in the slow lane It parked without a hazard light and early warning device As D2 the driver of said truck and his companion Junrey Camarquez Paredes were in the Skylar Tambayan Videobar having a relaxed drinking of beer Thus V1 riders sustained bodily injuries after the accident which were brought to Lupon District Hospital for medication but Adnan Pangasate Famor driver and Gilbert Pangasate passenger who sat in the Single MC tank were declared DOA by his attending physician Dr Romeo Pable D2 and his driven V2 were now in the custody of this station The V2 driver Benhar Escorel Agga presented his DL card bearing number L09 19 009356 will expire on February 20 2024 However V1 riders were not wearing helmets IOC PSSg Cayetano Diaz Jr 09985987132

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO DAMAGE TO PROPERTY - RPC Art 365
narrative: RIR DTPGigi Rose Nuynay Monro 36 years old married female and a resident of P 2 Brgy Magdug Governor Generoso Davao Oriental with driver license number LO7 20 00973 expiration date 2025 07 25 agency code LO7 DI codes A A1 B B1 and B2 driving a Suzuki Celerio colored silver with plate number GDM9505 official receipt 1128 000000089311 certificate of registration number 322894784 with the registered name John Seton M Monro appeared before this station and requested to put it on record that at about 12 55 p m On September 4 2023 while she sent his son inside the Maryknoll School she parked her car in front of the church and saw another vehicle a Bonggo color blue parked behind her After she sent his son inside the school she went back to her car but she learned that the right side of her car was deformed and there was a blue paint mark They believed that the blue Bongo accidentally bumped her car

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO DAMAGE TO PROPERTY - RPC Art 365
narrative: Team returned to station with an information after the conduct of initial traffic investigation which disclosed that at about 5 00 PM of September 9 2023 one 1 unit V1 Nissan Navara color black with plate no NCU 4102 attached with engine no YD25764819T Chassis no MNTCC2D23Z0037569 Official Receipt number 1112 000000126593 dated February 21 2023 Certificate of Registration number 312407292 dated May 10 2018 driven by D1 Junvic Natividad Nasayao 35 years old single member of Philippine National Police with Driver s License no L07 11 00307 which expires on June 10 2024 and a resident of Catitipan Brgy Buhangin Davao City was traversing from Davao City bound for Governor Generoso Davao Oriental upon reaching along the highway of Prk Quinoan Brgy Talisay San Isidro Davao Oriental above mentioned vehicle was accidentally hit by single motorcycle traversing from opposite direction describe as one 1 unit V2 Honda TMX color black with plate no 160 LZK attached driven by D2 Flores Mahusay Neri 43 years old married and a resident of Prk 2 B Jamboree Brgy Nangan Governor Generoso Davao Oriental holder of student permit license no L07 23 507485 which expires on January 23 2024 Official Receipt number 2239925601 dated June 31 2022 Certificate of Registration number 4570935711 dated September 5 2022 with back rider named Patrick James Neri As a result D2 and his back rider sustained injuries in different parts of their bodies and were rushed to Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital Governor Generoso by the responding personnel of 2nd DOPMFC 3RD Platoon for proper medical treatment while D1 was fortunately unharmed V1 incurred damages in its left side portion particularly on the passenger second door while V2 incurred damage on different motor parts both in unestimated cost of repair and now under the custody of this station for proper disposition IOC PCpl John Vincent Fuñe Progress Report to follow

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO HOMICIDE - RPC Art 365
narrative: That the said V1 was travelling from Crossing Punta Gemelina Brgy Badas Going to Brgy Culian Mati City while V2 was travelling from Brgy Culian going to Crossing Punta Gemelina Badas Mati City Upon reaching the above mentioned place of incident particularly at the curved lane both vehicles had head on collision when V1 swerved into left entered the lane of V2 As a result both vehicles fell on the road and incurred damages Said drivers and backriders sustained injuries V1 driver and back rider were brought to St Camillus Hospital Mati City while V2 driver and back rider were brought to DOPMC for thier immediate medical treatment

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: ALLEGED RIR PHYSICAL INJURY 8710 04 36 PM MDRRMC CALLED THIS OFFICE INFORMING THAT THERE WAS A ROAD CRASH ACCIDENT TRANSPIRED AT RIZAL STREET BRGY POBLACION LUPON DAVAO ORIENTAL 8711 05 45 PM ICOW BLOTTER NO 8610 RETURNED STATION AFTER CONDUCTING OCULAR INVESTIGATION REGARDING ON ROAD CRASH ACCIDENT RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURIES AND DAMAGE TO PROPERTIES TRANSPIRED AT THE ABOVEMENTIONED AREA AT ABOUT 04 25 PM OF SEPTEMBER 19 2023 INVOLVING ONE 1 MC HONDA ACH110CBTL3 COLOR BLACK WITH MV FILE NUMBER 0364 00000159607 ENGINE NUMBER JF78E7270936 CHASSIS NUMBER K81N0005678 CR NUMBER 40206586 0 DATED 11 09 2020 OR NUMBER 2134293825 DATED 12 12 2022 OWNED BY MARK Z ZAMORA AND DRIVEN BY JERALD AREGLADO ZAMORA 22 YRS OLD SINGLE A RESIDENT OF BRK 5 POBLACION LUPON DAVAO ORIENTAL WITH DRIVERS LICENSE NUMBER L07 21 203941 VALID UNTIL 02 08 2026 AND ONE 1 BICYCLE DRIVEN BY KENNIX LINGASA 13 YEARS OLD STUDENT A RESIDENT OF RIZAL STREET POBLACION LUPON DAVAO ORIENTAL INITIAL INVESTIGATION REVEALED THAT ALLEGEDLY THE SAID MC OVERTOOK A VEHICLE AND HE DID NOT NOTICED THE BICYCLE THAT CROSSED THE STREET THE MC TRIED TO AVOID THE BICYCLE BUT STILL HIT ITS FRONT WHEEL DUE TO IMPACT THE DRIVER OF THE BICYCLE SUSTAIN MINOR INJURIES AND WAS RUSHED BY THE MDRRMC PERSONNEL TO LUPON DOPH FOR IMMEDIATE MEDICAL TREATMENT WHILE THE LICENSE AND REGISTRATION AS WELL AS THE MC WAS BROUGHT TO THIS OFFICE FOR PROPER DISPOSITION

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: 2 In relation with the above reference please be inform that at about 9 40 PM of September 19 2023 duty Dest Officer us and informing that there was a road crash incident at Tagamot Barangay Dawan Mati City Immediately thereafter mobile 3 personnel led by Pcpl Aquino together with duty traffic investigator Pat Albelda proceeded to the said place to conduct ocular investigation 3 Initial investigation conducted disclosed that at about 9 30 PM of September 19 2023 a road crash incident was transpired at Sitio Tagamot National Road of Barangay Dawan Mati City Involving two Vehicles discribed as follows V1 Toyota Hilux bearing Plate no LAD 1927 driven by Zosimo Tirino Palmera 30 yo Single Male Driver a resident of Purok Buhangin Barangay Central Tarragona Davao Oriental with two Passenger identified as namely 1 Helen Uy 65 yo female Married a resident of Purok Agawon Barangay Central Tarragona Davao Oriental 2 Rojely Macpaw 38 yo female a resident of Purok Agawon Barangay Central Tarragona Davao Oriental V2 Honda wave Motorcycle bearing plate no LD69925 driven by Bennie Cosares Mabale 54yo male married jobless a resident of Purok San Vicente Manikling San Isidro Davao Oriental with two unidentified backrider 4 Investigation revealed that the said vehicles were traveling in the opposite direction V1 coming from Buhangin Davao City Going Purok Agawon Barangay Central Tarragona Davao Oriental while V2 was coming from Barangay Macambol Mati City going Purok San Vicente Barangay Manikling San Isidro Davao Oriental On the said TDPO the right side of V2 hit the right side portion of V1 while V1 entered the lane of V2 as a result V2 fell on the road and both vehicle incurred un estimated damages the driver of V2 sustained injuries and later were rushed by the responding CDRMO Personnel to DOPMC for medical treatment Upon arrival of the responding PNP Personnel the backrider of V2 no longer at said place Accordingly driver of V2 he didn t recognize his backriders Furthermore driver of V2 seemingly under influence of entoxicated liquor 5 Driver of V2 Bennie C Mabale sustained multiple fractured right arm and right leg referred to Southern Philippine Medical Center Davao City 6 Progress report will follow IOC Pat Joseph Marlon Albelda 09652559684

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO DAMAGE TO PROPERTY - RPC Art 365
narrative: RIR DAMAGE TO PROPERTYJonathan Abadiez Ababon 54 years old married a tricycle driver and a resident of P 2 Brgy Tibanban this municipality appeared at this station and informed us that while he was driving his tricycle and picking up a passenger upon reaching the national highway of Dahlia 2 Brgy Tibanban he was bumped behind a motorcycle driven by Anabelia Medel Chicote 73 years old female and a resident of Dao Upper Tibanban this municipality Thereafter the report PMSgt Teodoro L Blaya the duty investigator proceeded to the above mentioned place to conduct a follow up investigation at the scene of the incident Initial investigation disclosed the V1 Ababon traversing from the south to the north of Brgy Tibanban and V2 Chicote traverse from Sitio Dao Upper Tibanban going north of Brgy Tibanban Upon reaching Dahlia 2 Tibanban National Highway they were traversing in the same direction but B2 was behind V1 and she did not notice that V1 applied slow running because there was one passenger wanting to ride resulting in V2 bumping behind V1 and the passenger of V2 was immediately brought to Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital Gov Generoso for medication and one 1 witness employee of Phil Fumes Gas Station Joseph Magas the pump boy of said station told us that V1 motorcycle was one of their relatives took the motorcycle from the scene and going to Upper Tibanban

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO HOMICIDE - RPC Art 365
narrative: Initial investigation conducted disclosed that A vehicular collision transpired at Crossing lower Tagawisan National Road of Barangay Badas Mati City involving motorcycle and Pedistrian described as follows V1 honda xrm 125 bearing MV file number 1101 0361607 driven by Cesar M Moaton 56 years old male married Agricultural Technologist CLGU s Mati City and aresident of Lower Salazar Village BarangayCentral Mati City Pedestrian Anita Salas 62 years old female live in partner Senion Citizen and a resident of Lower Tagawisan Barangay Badas Mati City 4 That the said motorcycle was traveling from Lower Salazar Village going to Tagawisanof this City Upon reaching at the abovementioned place of incident said motorcycle bumped into pedestrian who was walking across the road thus pedestrian and motorcycle fell on the road As a result pedestrian and said driver suffered injuries and was rushed to Davao Oriental Provencial Medical Center DOPMC for medical treatment 5 That the said pedestrian Anita Salas was declared dead by attending physician Antonette Ababon Pagaduan MD 6 The cadaver of late Anita Salas is now already in MCCC funeral homes located at Menzi BarangayDahican Mati City 7 Moreover Cesar M Moaton was in the stable condition but he was currently confined at DOPMC The said motorcycle was turn over to LTO office for violation of reckless driver and driving without driver s license 8 Progress report will follow for information IOC PCpl Sumaliling 09487973937 Pat Al P lalang 09350813842

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO HOMICIDE - RPC Art 365
narrative: RIR HOMICIDE A cncerned citizen called this station thru hotline number informing that there was a vehicular incident transpired at Purok 6 Timbo Brgy Mnauel Roxas of this municipality PSSg Tomica and PSSg Gandarosa duty investigator proceede to the said place to verify the veracity of the report Initial investigation conducted disclosed that at about 5 10pm of October 3 2023V1 a Euro motorcycle Asenso 150 color black with side cae with chassis number LP7PCKL25FL3001120 driven by Gerado Daita Aballe 60 years old male married and a resident of Purok 3 Brgy Manuel Roxas of this municipality and V2 XRM 110 color black engine number XRM10ME7182363 driven by John Laurence Doldolao 18 years old single student and a resident of P Pakisama La Union San Isidro Davao Oriental According tot he witness bothe vehicles traversing on the same direction V1 tailing by V2 They also stated that V2 Drove his motorcycle in prone position superman using his hands to change gear but upon reaching at the palce of incident V2 did not noticed V1 and accidentally bumped the rear portion of V1 Both drivers sustained injuries on the different of their bodies and brought to Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital for treatment while both motorcycles incurred damages However at about 6 10pm of October 3 2023 driver of V2 was declared dead by Dra Vassil Baliling

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO MULTIPLE DAMAGE TO PROPERTY - RPC Art 365
narrative: Initial investigation conducted disclosed that at around 6 20 PM of same date road crash incident transpired at near Mayo Bridge National Road Barangay Don Enrique Lopez Mati City involving two 2 motorcycles described as follows V1 Honda XR 200 motorcycle bearing plate number LI 11014 driven by Primo Restor Jabilles ll 45 year old male married Area Manager of DORECO and a resident of Upper Bliss Barangay Sainz Mati City and V2 Honda CRF 150 motorcycle bearing engine number KD12E7111855 with chassis number MH1KD1279HK111844 driven by Rake Bentayao Miranda 28 years old male single resident of Sitio Bitoon Barangay Don Enrique Lopez Mati City 4 Upon arrival the PNP responding personnel at the said place V2 has already been removed from the original position Both vehicles were traveling in same direction in which V2 on led followed by V1 Upon reaching at above mentioned place of incident then V2 about to turn left causing V1 to bumped the left rear portion of V2 and both vehicles fell on the road As a result both drivers suffered injuries and were rushed to Davao Oriental Provincial Medical Center DOPMC by CDRRMO personnel for medical treatment While both vehicles incurred damages and brought in this station for proper disposition 5 Moreover driver of V1 holder of driver license and had OR CR presented while driver of V2 has no driver license presented and OR CR

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO HOMICIDE - RPC Art 365
narrative: RIR HOMICIDE 8783 10 11 2023 Around 10 50 PM of October 10 2023 a call from MDRRMC was received by this station informing that there was a vehicular accident transpired at National Highway Brgy Corporacion Lupon Davao Oriental Immediately personnel from this station led by PCPL Dexter A Arles Asst Traffic Investigator left this office to verify the veracity of the report and to conduct an ocular investigation At around 11 00 PM arrived at the place wherein the victim was identified as Jerry Alcantara Madjus Jr The victim was attended for medical treatment by the MDRRMC personnel and was rushed to Lupon DOPH but pronounced dead on arrival by Dr Clea Capito the attending Physician Initial investigation disclosed that vehicles involved were MV Toyota Hulix 2 4L E color white as v 1 with plate number LAL 4297 driven by Garry Cutillas Rovilla 35 years old and a resident of Ong Subdivision Mati City Davao Oriental with PDL L07 17 001059 and one 1 MC Raider 150fi color red as v 2 without plate number no OR CR presented without Driver s license and driven by Jerry Alcantara Madjus Jr 19 years old and a resident of Purok 2 Cocornon Lupon Davao Oriental It also revealed that v 1 was coming from Poblacion Lupon heading towards Mati City while v 2 coming from Barangay Cocornon heading towards Poblacion Lupon upon reaching the place of incident v 1 making a u turn going back to Poblacion Lupon then v 2 bumped into the side of the hood of v 1 As a result driver of v 2 fell on the cemented road Vehicles involved were brought to this station together with the driver of v1 for proper disposition

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: at about 11 00 PM of October 20 2023 a mobile phone call from concerned citizen was received by this station informing about a Vehicular Incident transpired along the national highway of Barangay San Roque San Isidro Davao Oriental involving a Truck Bus King long BACHELOR and a motorcycle Upon receipt of information duty Traffic investigator immediately proceeded to the above mentioned place to verify the veracity of the said report as well as to conduct ocular traffic investigation Information gathered during the ocular investigation conducted both parties were completely identified as one 1 Truck Bus King long V1 bearing plate number NAB 5580 driven by Nono L Bualan D1 47 years old Bachelor driver and a resident of 1 Jupiter St Aeroville Subdivision Pasay City and one 1 EURO 150 V2 color black with a sidecar attached driven by Mario M Lambojon D2 54 years old and a resident of Purok 23 Barangay Manikling San Isidro together with his one passenger Still on Verification Initial Investigation conducted disclosed that at about 6 40 PM V1 was traversing in the inner lane going in the north direction and V2 was also traversing in the inner lane going in the South direction When both drivers reached Barangay San Roque San Isidro Davao Oriental this V1 tried to overtake another vehicle thereby encroaching the opposite lane where V2 was traversing which resulted in a side collision therefrom this claim is supported by the statement of the witnesses at the scene As a consequence D2 incurred a severe leg injury while D1 tried to evade by leaving the victim however he was intercepted at the Lupon Bus terminal which resulted in his apprehension It can be noted that the roadway has a double solid yellow lane where no passing or crossing of the double solid yellow line at any time With that a case for violation of Reckless Imprudence Resulting in Physical Injuries and Damage to Property under Article 365 about Article 263 of the Revised Penal Code is now being readied by this office for inquest proceedings A progress Report will follow IOC PCpl Jessie Mar Lazaga

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: RIR PHYSICAL INJURY this station received a phone call from MDRRMO informing that a vehicular accident transpired along Purok Dahlia 2 Brgy Tibanban of this muncipality ICOW team led by PMSG Teodoro Blaya Duty investigator responded to the incident and initial investigation conducted disclosed that one Dan Monjerie Abadiez 33 years old male married and a resident of Purok 1 Brgy Crispin dela Cruz of this municipality was driving his Bajaj motorcycle color black with plate no 800LZA referred as V1 and Irene Grace Damaso 27 years old female live in and a resident of Brgy Anitap of this municipality driving her motorcycle Euro Spirit color black with plate no 881LNY Facts that V1 was traversing from Purok Sampaguita going to Purok Dahlia 2 Brgy tibanban upon reaching in front of Gutual carwash he executed left turn going back to his destination when suddenly V2 traversing the same direction did not noticed the signal of V1 and bumped V1 from behind The incident resulted to injuries to both drivers and they were brought to the nearest hospital for proper medication

narrative: Please be informed that on December 26 2023 about 12 15 pm a call from MDRRMC was received by this office informing that there was an alleged Road Crash Collision transpired at the National Highway Purok Mahayahay Barangay Calapagan Lupon Davao Oriental Immediately personnel from this office led by PSSg Michael J Bongar Traffic Investigator left this office to verify the veracity of the report and to conduct ocular investigation 3 At around 1 25 pm to date arrived at the place wherein two 2 unit were involved V1 One Toyota Corolla 1 6GA SEDAN MV bearing Plate No VED311 with Chassis No MR053REE104143346 Engine No 1ZRX214390 2012 model Thermalyte color with Official Receipt No 1128 000000071907 dated 01 11 2023 Certificate of Registration No 40802434 1 dated 01 08 2021 owned by Rizalina Deloas Angeles Ambayec and driven by Vicente Mocoy Ambayec 48 years old Filipino married Government Employee with PDL G06 10 000283 valid until 2033 04 05 V2 Kubota Tractor color orange owned by Joselito Estrera Semiros 58 years old farmer and a resident of Purok DCS Barangay Marayag Lupon Davao Oriental and pedestrians Camille Grace Singcolan Toledo 24 years old student and Nova Desa Singcolan Toledo 2 years old and a resident of Purok Mahayahay Brgy Calapagan Lupon Davao Oriental 4 Initial investigation disclosed V1 was traversing the national highway of Brgy Calapagan from Mati city when the driver hit Camille Grace Singcolan Toledo and Nova Desa Singcolan Toledo who were walking at the side of the highway and also hit V2 Kubota Tractor owned by Joselito Estrera Semiros whom at that moment parked at the side of the highway that about to unload his copra 5 The three 3 victims were rushed to DOPMC Mati City but declared DOA by attending physician Ronald A Robinos MD while the driver V1 voluntarily surrendered and oth MV s were now at the custody of Cluster 11 R PSB Barangay Calapagan Lupon Davao Oriental NPS XI 05B INQ 23L 0157

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO HOMICIDE - RPC Art 365
narrative: RIR HOMICIDE ALARMS SCANDALS Please be informed that at about 5 00 AM of January 1 2024 Barangay Kagawad of Tandangsora Robert Matig aldaw Magsical 47 years old and a resident of Purok Gemilina Barangay Tandangsora Governor Generoso Davao Oriental called this office thru cellular phone CP and informed that one Felmar Cayetano Maldas 37 years old laborer and a resident of same place got wild thereat Immediately Patrol Team of this office led by PSSg Jaymar Tomica responded on the report that resulted to the apprehension of the suspect Initial investigation conducted revealed that at about 3 30 AM of same date at the abovementioned place particularly at the residence of victim Rosalinda Patilang Luganao 59 years old widow While they are celebrating New Year the said suspect arrived there and without any apparent reason he got wild broke the drinking glass and looking for a fight The victim approached the suspect and asked him why he broke the drinking glass However he answered by shouting to the victim saying in vernacular words Ilisi ning baso resulting the victim to get nervous and collapsed on the ground Immediately the victim was brought to Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital Governor Generoso but at around 5 10 AM of same date the victim declared dead on arrival by Dr Crizghil E Sarad MD The arrested suspect was held at this office for proper disposition IOC PSSg Amsali P Gandarosa 09755139146 Case filed at Prosecutor s office at Lupon Davao Oriental with docket Number NPS XI 05b INQ 24A 0002 dated January 5 2024 under Atty Neil C pudpud Provincial Prosecutor

investigation 3 Initial investigation conducted disclosed that at around 4 18 PM of same date road crash incident transpired at Bigue 2 National Highway Barangay Dawan Mati City involving two 2 vehicles described as follows V1 TVS trike bearing plate number 758LYT color red driven by Khasam M Magdoboy 29 years old male single driver and a resident of Kadanlaan Barangay Dahican Mati City With offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO HOMICIDE - RPC Art 365
narrative: RIR HOMICIDE 8 10 PSSg Eric A Osol assigned to RPSB Cluster 19 at Barangay Nangan of this municipality call this office and informed in this office that a vehicular incident transpired at Purok 19 Baranagay Tiblawan Governor Generoso Davao Oriental 8 13 PM Acted on the report PSSg Owen Y Zaragosa duty investigator immediately proceeded at the aforementioned under the direct supervision of PMAJ MARVIE P SINGAYAN ACOP onboard mobile patrol to verify the veracity of the report 9 20 PM Personnel arrived at the station and bought two 2 motorcycles involved in road crash accident are one 1 XRM color yellow with chassis number KPYR0012544 engine number KPYROEO12557 and plate number 556LAZ driven by Jake Salibana Villaroya 19 years old single student and resident of Purok 7 Barangay Nangan Governor Generoso Davao Oriental referred as V1 together with his back ride passenger Jenamie Taghoy Omega 19 years old single and resident of Purok 4 Barangay Tamban Governor Generoso Davao Oriental and one motorcycle SKYGO color red and black with chassis number LX8XCJTB2LAOO7313 no plate attached driven by Dominador Pacatang Padongao 50 years old married carpentry and resident of Purok 3 Barangay Anitap Governor Generoso Davao Oriental referred as V2 Traffic investigation conducted disclosed that both motorcycles V1 and V2 traversed in opposite directions V1 traversed from south to north bound while V2 traversed from north to south bound when they arrived at the scene of the accident V2 encroached on the lane of V1 which resulted in a head on collision As a result of their impact both motorcycles fell down on the cemented road causing both drivers and passenger to suffer severe head injuries Immediately both driver and passenger were brought by the first responder from the personnel of MDRRMO and transported it to Governor Generoso Provincial Hospital however both drivers V1 V2 were declared dead on arrival by the attending physician Dr Christian Joy Galo while the passenger was referred to Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital Mati City for medical treatment

narrative: IT IS PLACED ON RECORD THAT AT AROUND 9 02 PM OF MAY 8 2024 ONE 1 CONCERNED CITIZEN CALLED THIS OFFICE INFORMING THAT THERE WAS A VEHICULAR ACCIDENT ALONG THE NATIONAL HIGHWAY OF BARANGAY CORPORACION LUPON DAVAO ORIENTAL AT AROUND 9 04 PM TEAM LED BY PSSG REYNALDO H TRIBUNALO JR ASST TRAFFIC PNCO IMMEDIATELY PROCEEDED TO THE PLACE TO CONDUCT OCULAR INVESTIGATION AT AROUND 9 20 PM RETURNED STATION AFTER CONDUCTING INITIAL INVESTIGATION ON ROAD CRASH RESULTING IN DAMAGE TO PROPERTIES INVOLVING ONE 1 V1 KINGLONG TRUCK BUS COLOR YELLOW PLATE NR NAB5588 ENGINE NR YC6J23020J40QAG30147 CHASSIS NR LA6A1DAD4GB202497 DRIVEN BY JADE MARION BETONIO PABLICO 33 YRS OLD MARRIED PDL NR L02 14 003312 EXPIRED ON 11 09 2026 A RESIDENT OF P2 SITIO CARNAGAN BARGY BAYABAS TORIL DAVAO CITY CONDUCTOR MARICRIS PAL 30 YEARS OLD SINGLE A RES OF BRGY CAMBALION SAN ISIDRO DAVAO ORIENTAL ONE 1 V2 SYM COLOR BLUE PLATE NR BE12946 NO OR CR PRESENTED DRIVEN BY EDGARDO LEONES CARRIEDO 60YRS OLD MARRIED PDL NR L07 99 014699 EXPIRED ON 2 9 2025 A RES OF PRK 7 TOWNSITE BRGY POBLACION LUPON DAVAO ORIENTAL INVESTIGATION REVEALED FROM THE WITNESS WHO WAS THERE WHEN THE INCIDENT HAPPEN THAT MV TRAVERSING THE NATIONAL HIGHWAY PARTICULARLY IN 66IB DETATCHMENT AT BARANGAY CORPORACION AND MOVING OPPOSITE DIRECTION V1 HEADING MATI CITY WHILE V2 HEADING LUPON TERMINAL UPON V1 ENTERING THE BARICADE OF 66IB V2 DID NOT PASS THROUGH THE MOTOR LANE OF THE BARICADE OF 66IB SO V2 HIT ON THE RIGHT SIDE WITH THE REAR SIDE OF V1 V2 DRIVER IMMEDIATELY RUSHED TO LUPON PROVINCIAL DISTRICT HOSPITAL FOR MEDICAL TREATMENT AND WAS EXAMINED BY THE ATTENDING PHYSICIAN DR ROSE LIM DUE TO STRONG IMPACT V2 VEHICLE INCURRED DAMAGE TO AN UNESTIMATED COST OF REPAIR AND REPLACEMENT WHICH NOW UNDER POLICE PROTECTIVE CUSTODY FOR PROPER DISPOSITION OFFICER ON CASE PSSG REYNALDO H TRIBUNALO JR ASST TRAFFIC PNCO

125 Kawasaki with no plate attached chassis number MD2A76BX3RWK57736 and engine umber DYXWRK01025 Dielbert Ellazo a 22 year old resident is the driver Holder a professional driver license LO7 22 years old married female both a resident of Brgy Tagabebe Governor Generoso Davao Oriental No pertinent documents were presented during the interview at DOPH at Governor Generoso Davao Oriental Facts narrative: At around 04 55 AM of August 9 2024 personnel from this office led by PSMS Kristian Leigh R Austria duty traffic investigator together with PCPL Kerwin Malintad all duty patrollers were conducting patrolling upon reaching at Aguinaldo St fronting Lupon Water District patrollers saw Four 4 persons namely Japet Abulang Mulla 30 yo Filipino V1 driver without drivers license a resident of Prk Dalsa Brgy Ilangay Lupon Davao Oriental together with his backrider Mayen Babanggol Rosete 27 yo Filipino single a resident of Paradan Compound Brgy Poblacion Lupon Davao Oriental and Victor Sombreo 26 yo Filipino V2 driver without drivers license a resident of Purok Molave 1 Brgy Batobato Municipality of San Isidro together with his backrider Daisy Basilan 22 years old a resident of Purok Sta Cruz Mandalihan Lupon Davao Oriental laid on the road with two 2 damaged motorcycles Upon verification they were involved in a Road Crash Collision Initial investigation conducted by this office revealed that V1 driver was driving a Yamaha Mio Mc bearing plate number L858IP from Rizal St upon reaching at Aguinaldo St driver was about to turn left going to Jkob Resto Bar but his driven motorcycle was collided at V2 Honda RS MC bearing plate number LA 38202 coming from Prk Immaculada St Due to impact both motorcycles incurred damage and drivers together with their backrider sustained injury at different parts of their body Further both drivers have no pertinent documents presented with their driven motorcycles They were brought to Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital together with their backriders by the MDRRMO Lupon personnel while the motorcycles were now at the custody of this office for proper disposition

narrative: Initial investigation conducted that at about 7 16AM of September 2 2024 a Road Crash incident transpired at Sitio Sopsopon 1 Barangay Macambol Mati City involving vehicle described as follows Hyundai van color white with plate no LFA 458 Chassiss no KMFDJIAPTU319449 Engine no D4BAT297721 driven by Randie T Abayon 39 years old male single driver a resident of Sitio Catmonan Brgy Macambol City of Mati Davao Oriental without drivers license and with 11 passengers identify as 1 Freya traburanza 14 years old 2 Crista Taburanza 12 years old 3 Xymon Bohol 13 years old 4 Paullo Bohol 15 years old 5 Reazle mae Digno 15 years old 6John Blake Cumara 14 years old 7 ChrisJhonVirtudez 15 years old 8 Devine Grace Digno 14 years old 9 Mark Abayon Lorence 14 years old 10 Leonard Abayon 17 years old 11 Chloe P Virtudez 13 years The aforesaid vehicle was traveling coming from Sitio Catmonan Brgy Macambol heading towards National Highschool Macambol Mati City Upon reaching the abovementioned place of incident particularly in a curved lane and down hill portion the vehicle swerved right and fell on the road side According to the driver he lost control of the steering wheel due to experiencing break malfunction As a result the vehicle incurred damage while the passengers sustained injuries and were brought by the responding Brgy Mobile of Macambol to DOPMC hospital for medical attention but one 1 passenger named Chloe Virtudez declared dead on arrival by his attending physician Dr Pete T Rodriguez RMT MD In addition the vehicle involved still at the area of incident unable to run due to its mechanical malfunction and waiting for retrieval The driver was brought to this station for further investigation and proper disposition

narrative: ICOW preceding blotter entry returned station with information gathered and information conducted disclosed that at about 3 50 PM dated October 11 2024 V1 described asYAMAHA Mio Sporty Scooter color black with plate nr 211LKL engine nr SLW04YI 24 chassis nr PAOSEF21OJ0089305 driven by a certain D1 Noel MeriguiñaUrbano male 20 years old student and a resident of Brgy Batobato San Isidro Davao Oriental was traversing the national highway from Prk Sto Niño Brgy Batobato heading to south bound going to Municipality of Gov Generoso and upon reaching at Prk Bituing Marikit Brgy Baon of this Municipality V1 executed left turn but the left side portion of his driven motorcycle was accidentally bumped by V2 which was traversing from behind heading also on the same direction described as Suzuki Raider motorcycle color black with plate nr L512ME engine nr CGAi 774801 chassis nr DLIIA 115140 certificate of registration nr 0027394410 under the name of Mark T Cortez with official receipt nr 110124000025742 dated June 10 2024 driven by D2 Reden Andaya Lantapon 33 y o male single self employed holder of driver s license nr L02 16 006232 valid until September 3 2033 and a resident of Prk 29 A Estores Panacan Davao City As consequences thereof both drivers slammed at the asphalted road along with their respective driven motorcycles thereby sustaining injuries in the different parts of their bodies and were immediately rushed to Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital Lupon by the responding MDRRMO San Isidro personnel for proper medical attention Motorcycles involved incurred damages undetermined cost and now under the custody of San Isidro MPS for proper disposition IOC by PMSg Alvin Arilla with CP nr 09099635347

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: At around 06 45 PM of October 13 2024 a call from MDRRMO Lupon was received by this office informing that there was an alleged Road Crash collision transpired at the National Highway Of Brgy Bagumbayan Lupon Davao Oriental Upon received the information duty patrollers led by PCMS Joseph H Buyante together with PSMS Kristian Leigh R Austria duty traffic investigator were called to respond the report At around 06 47 PM of the same date responding personnel arrived at the scene at the National Highway of Purok Pag Asa Brgy Bagumbayan Lupon Davao Oriental transpired at around 06 40 PM of October 13 2024 involving one V1 Kawasaki Bajaj with Engine number DYYWKB24662 Chassis number MD2A76BY5KWB57008 without plate number owned and driven by Rolly Bastawang Suyamin 45 yo Fil married jobless together with his daughter Rhonnavil Amor Maasin Suyamin 14 yo Fil both residents of Prk Ligaya Brgy Bagumbayan Lupon Davao Oriental and one V2 Honda TMX 125 MC with Engine Number KSWWOE044799 Chassis number KSWW0045091 with temporary plate number 1101 1098341 owned and driven by Mr Dexter Gogo Embatic 25 yo Fil single private employee a resident of Prk Pag Asa Brgy Bagumbayan Lupon Davao Oriental Initial investigation conducted by this office revealed that the driver of V1 together with his daughter were traversing the Highway from Poblacion Lupon upon reaching at Prk Pag Asa Brgy Bagumbaya driver of V2 coming alongside of the road suddenly crossed and upon seeing V1 driver of V2 maneuvered U Turn but it was collided at V1 Due to impact V1 and V2 swerved on the road and incurred damage while the drivers and the back rider sustained injury at different parts of their body Further both drivers failed to present the pertinent documents of their driven motorcycle Drivers together with its back rider were brought to Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital by the MDRRMO personnel while the motorcycles were brought to this office for proper disposition

narrative: Blotter Entry number 1679 and 1680 Please be informed that on October 17 2024 at 10 35 o clock in the morning a call from MDRRMC personnel was received by this office informing that there was an alleged Road Crash Accident transpired at Panuncialman Street Prk Mahayahay Brgy Poblacion infront of the Exit of Comara T Manuel Elementary School Immediately personnel from this office led by PSSg Michael J Bongar Asst Traffic Investigator left this office to verify the veracity of the report and conduct ocular investigation At around 10 37 in the morning to date arrived at the place wherein one 1 unit of MC and one 1 Pedestrian were involved one 1 unit of Honda CFT 125 MSM color gray black with plate number 944LOW chassis number KPYV0003770 engine number KPYV0E003713 CR number 42184717 1 OR number 1128 000000144197 dated 03 14 2024 registered under the name of Alma L Coligado and driven by Jezreel Bongato Paragoya 27 yrs old single and a resident of San Vicente Cabadiangan Lupon Davao Oriental And Pedestrian one 1 Zhian Prince A Ilag ilag 11 years old and a resident of Prk Mabuhay Ilangay Lupon Davao Oriental time of accident was around 10 33 o clock in the morning to date Initial investigation disclosed that while the MC was traversing Panuncialman Street and when he reach the exit of Comara T Manuel Elementary school a pedestrian student suddenly crossed the road and as a result the MC side swept the said pedestrian and caused him minor injuries the pedestrian was immediately rushed by the MDRRMC personnel to Lupon DOPH for medical treatment The driver and the vehicle involved are already in custody of this station for proper disposition

narrative: At around 05 50 PM of October 18 2024 a call from MDRRMO Dispatched Lupon was received by this office informing that there was an alleged Road Crash collision transpired at the National Highway OF Purok Magdagongdong Brgy Poblacion Lupon Davao Oriental Upon received the information duty patrollers together with PSMS Kristian Leigh R Austria duty traffic investigator were called to respond the report At around 05 52 PM October 18 2024 of the same date responding personnel arrived at the above mentioned place of accident wherein the accident transpired at around 05 40 PM of October 18 2024 involving two 2 vehicles One 1 as V1 SINOTRUK bearing plate number NE2903 Gas Tanker Engine number and Chassis number is not clear owned by Supergas Corporation driven by Niño Ayubong Aguilar legal age married driver by occupation with driver s license number KO3 00 049274 valid until 2028 12 20 a resident of Poblacion Valencia Bukidnon and One 1 as V2 Honda BR V SUV bearing plate number LAA9860 Engine number L15Z13964610 and Chassis number is not clear owned and driven by Aubrey Carnecer Compra legal age Filipino single a resident of Purok Sadya Brgy San Roque San Isidro Davao Oriental driving a Honda BR with driver s license L07 15 000749 valid until 2032 06 24 Initial investigation conducted by this office revealed that V1 was traversing the National Highway of Lupon going to City of Mati upon reaching at Prk Magdagongdong Brgy Poblacion Lupon Davao Oriental collided at V2 Further investigation revealed that V2 coming from Litson Manok Broasted Chicken located beside the highway suddenly maneuvered U Turn heading towards Lupon proper and driver of V1 did not notice V2 as a result they collided which causes damage at the right sidings of V1 and damage at the bumper of V2 Drivers and vehicles were brought to this office for proper disposition

narrative: At around 02 00 PM of October 19 2024 team led by PCapt Jefferson D Pelovello on board mobile patrol car while traversing National Highway from Brgy Magsaysay Lupon upon reaching at Brgy Limbahan Lupon Davao Oriental the team saw a Road Crash Accident Immediately PSMS Kristian Leigh R Austria duty traffic investigator conducted ocular investigation wherein the accident was transpired at around 01 50 PM of October 19 2024 and the involved vehicle was a KIA BONGO bearing plate number MAX 9297 with Engine number JT137320 Chassis number KNCSDO322XS441944 2019 model color yellow with Certificate of Registration number 436111303 dated 12 15 2021 Official receipt number 1128 000000124136 driven by Charlie Vergara Cañamo 31 years old single Filipino Farmer a resident of Purok Mabuhay Brgy Bagumbayan Lupon Davao Oriental with driver s license number L06 16 000112 valid until 2028 07 24 and one pedestrian Eleuterio Madjus Lola 70 years old Filipino a resident of Purok Asucena Brgy Limbahan Lupon Davao Oriental Initial investigation conducted by this office revealed while the driver of the KIA BONGO was traversing the National Highway from Municipality of San Isidro going to Municipality of Lupon upon reaching at the above mentioned place of accident a pedestrian suddenly crossed at the highway as result he was hit by the KIA BONGO Due to impact pedestrian sustained injury on his head Victim was brought to DOPH Lupon by the MDRRMO personnel while the vehicle together with the driver were brought to this office for proper disposition Officer on case PSMS Kristian Leigh R Austria 09190034248

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO DAMAGE TO PROPERTY - RPC Art 365
narrative: V1 was traveling from Poblacion Central going to Badas direction Mati City while V2 was traveling from Camansi Badas going to Mati Public Market Central Mati City Both vehicles were traveling in the opposite direction Upon reaching the above mentioned place of incident particularly in the curved lane V1 swerved out its lane went to opposite direction and bumped into the front side of V2 As a result V1 fell on the road and both vehicles incurred unestimated cost of damages The driver of V1 and passenger of V2 sustained injuries and were brought by the responding Mati CDRRMC personnel to Davao Oriental Provincial Medical Center DOPMC for medical treatment while first aid was done to driver of V2 for minor injuries During interview at DOPMC at about 3 05 PM of same date the driver of V1 pronounced dead by his attending physician Dr Kelvin J Laruya Cause of death severe tragic injury Secondary to multiple injury avulsed wound frontal area STC right chest Moreover both vehicles and the driver of V2 will brought to this station for proper disposition

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO MULTIPLE DAMAGE TO PROPERTY - RPC Art 365
narrative: A concerned citizen called through our hotline number reporting a road crash incident at purok 13 Brgy Central Manay In connection to entry number 2024 10 3972 PNP patrollers of the said place led by PSSg Mervin O Cagatan together with PSMS Joselito M Gomera duty investigator responded to verify the said report In connection to entry number 2024 10 3973 same team returned station with Initial investigation and revealed that at about 7 10 PM October 20 2024 a certain Felix Russel Soria 58 years old married resident of Purok 18 Brgy Central Manay Davao Oriental was driving a Black Ford Escape bearing plate number PPI 714 with Engine No L310486528 and Chassis No PE2EV662A1GL00134 referred to as V1 traversing the National Highway bound to Purok 29 Brgy Central Manay and upon reaching Purok 18 Brgy Central Manay said driver loses control of the steering wheel of his vehicle and swerved to the opposite lane and bumped on the road side walk street gutter and bumped at the right side of a certain Honda fit color gray bearing plate number MEG 304 with Engine No L13A 1533502 and Chassis No GD1 1530174 driven by Jaymar M Sampilo 38 years old married AFP and a resident of Purok 18 Brgy Central Manay Davao Oriental referred to as V2 that was parked to the direction of Purok 18 Brgy Central Manay and then bumped also on a Honda beat motorcycle color black bearing temporary plate number 1101 1039090 with Engine No JF78E7367021 and Chassis No K81n5012361 that driven by Richard Tabano 29 years old single and a resident of Mati City referred to as V3 that was also parked beside the road thereafter V1 had also bumped on a wifi vendo with metal casing and post and said metal had fall down and hit on a certain Chem Lascamana Mapayo 21 years old student and a resident of Brgy Manreza Manay Davao Oriental that was immediately brought to Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital Manay for medication Both drivers of V2 and V3 was not injured because they went out of their vehicle to buy lechon manok at the said area and according to them that V1 driver was so drunk and immediately fled away from the crime scene after the incident avoiding commotion from the bystanders in the area V1 was still at the crime because it cannot be moved due to damages on its front tires and needs to be towed while V2 and V3 where brought to this station for further investigation IOC PSMS Joselito M Gomera
