narrative: RIR PHYSICAL INJURY Please be informed at about 12 39 PM of October 21 2024 PCpl Salvador Bais Jr call this informing was a vehicular incident involving one 1 unit Yamaha Mio And and one 1 pedestrian passer transpired in front of National High School Exit in Barangay Tibanban Governor Generoso Davao Oriental Investigation conducted disclosed that at about 11 58 AM on October 21 2024 the victim identified as Nathan Kent C Lapyot born on October 8 2011 13 years old high school student and resident of Purok 6 Barangay Tibanban Governor Generoso Davao Oriental came from the school and went to his house and he walked across the road going to the other lane However a MC Yamaha MIO color orange white bearing engine serial number E3R2E 1612669 plate number 567LCE driven by Sylvester Opaw Babano born on January 13 2008 16 years old high school student and resident of Purok 9 Barangay Tibanban with a back ride passenger identified as Monester B Omilao born on November 12 2028 16years old high school student and resident of Purok Dahlia 1 Barangay Tibanban all in Governor Generoso Davao Oriental Said motorcycle was heading fast from Barangay Chicote and upon arriving at the place of incident the driver uncontrolled of his driven motorcycle accidentally hit the victim As a result the victim fell down on the cemented road as did the driver and the passenger and both of them incurred injuries and then immediately brought Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital Governor Generoso for medical treatment Further added parent of driver and parent of the victim opted to proceed at the office of Barangay Pobalcion this municipality for personal confrontation for possible mediation For information and progress report to follow Investigator on Case PSSg Owen Y Zaragosa with contact 096559862

narrative: on October 21 2024 at 05 49 o clock in the evening a call from a concerned citizen was received by this office informing that there was an alleged Road Crash Accident transpired at the color matte gray as V 1 with plate number L474DE engine number E3R2E 3242699 chassis number PA0SE9810N0699876 CR number 47250683 4 OR number 112824000000637 dated 02 29 2024 registered under the name 320772266 OR number 1110 000000211347 dated 06 18 2024 owned and driven by Rehuel Muño Tadena 60 yrs old married with drivers license number N01 07 021823 valid until 11 04 2033 and a resident of Prk narrative: At around 03 58 PM a call from PAT Kenneth Stephen Sarona RPSB personnel assigned at Brgy Limbahan this Municipality was received by this office informing that there was an alleged Road Crash Collision resulting in physical injury and damage to property in the said Barangay Upon receipt of the call duty Desk Officer immediately call the duty patrollers together with PSMS Kristian Leigh R Austria Chief Traffic Inves to verify the report and conduct ocular investigation At around 04 02 pm of the same date duty patrollers arrived at the scene wherein the said incident transpired at around 03 50 pm of October 24 2024 involving One 1 as V1 Francisco Majadas Arejer 62 yo Filipino without driver s license a resident of Prk Malinawon New Village Limbahan Davao Oriental driving a Kawasaki Bajaj MC with MV File number 1101 489622 color black 2018 model with Engine number DUZWHF58306 MD2A1BAY6HWF81053 with Official receipt number 1391390361 dated 05 23 2018 and Certificate of Registration number 314993223 dated 07 03 2018 owned by Reynaldo Q TAOY a resident of Prk DALSA Brgy Ilangay Lupon Davao Oriental and One 1 as V2Almer C Quiachon 31 yo single without drivers license a resident of Purok 9 Brgy Rang Ay Banaybanay Davao Oriental driving a Keeway MC with Engine number 0JI62FMJ 4B 12250617 and Chassis number LBBPEK6BJNBE72336 color black without pertinent documents presented Initial investigation revealed that while driver of V1 was traversing the National Highway of Brgy Limbahan assisting a motorcade upon reaching at Prk Asucena of the same Barangay V2 collided at the rear portion of V1 as a result both motorcycle swerved on the road causing damaged to V1 and V2 and injury to its driver Driver of V2 was brought to Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital by the MDRRMC personnel while involved motorcycles together with the driver of V1 were brought to this office for proper disposition

narrative: that at about 04 10 in the afternoon of November 9 2024 a concerned citizen call our hotline number and informing that there was a motorcycle road crash collisions incident transpired along the National Highway of Purok 4 Barangay San Vicente Banaybanay Davao Oriental Acted on the said report Duty Patrollers of this station led by PSSg Francisco Iligan II together with PSSg Ryan M Tugade Duty Traffic Investigator left station onboard on Toyota Hi Lux Mobile Car driven by Pat Jerald Sarona bound to the abovementioned place of incident to conduct ocular investigation Upon arrival two 2 units of motor vehicles were involved in the incident identified as follows V1 one 1 unit of Truck Fuso Canter Dump Truck bearing plate no MFE 883 engine number 4D32B04740 chassis number FE305BD490016 color green silver year model 2010 driven by Rasol Bangal Pasandan 46 years old 08 09 1977 male a resident of Purok Capangan Piso Banaybanay Davao Oriental V2 one 1 unit of Motorcycle Yamaha Aerox bearing plate no 328 LOY driven by Rodrigo Dela Cruz Pabora 66 years old male a resident of Purok San Vicente Banaybanay Davao Oriental Initial Investigation conducted revealed that on the stated time and date V1 was traversing along the National Highway of President Diosdado Macapagal coming from Barangay Piso heading towards Barangay Poblacion of this Municipality and upon reaching at the abovementioned place of incident particularly infront of Andico Rice Mill wherein V2 is coming from the rice mill beside the road running across and forcibly enter towards the lane of V1 and hit bumped to the right side portion portion of V1 As a result of the impact the driver of V2 was fell to the cemented road pavement and sustained injury in the different parts of his body and was immediately brought to Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital for medical treatment while the driver of V1 was voluntarily surrendered to this office and both motor vehicles involved were incurred to un estimated cost of damages and was brought at this station for proper disposition IOC PSSg Ryan M Tugade 09564811949

narrative: At 09 40 pm of November 11 2024 a call from PMSG Bebeth M Besa RPSB DONCAMAR was received by this office informing that there was an alleged Road Crash collision transpired at Brgy Don Mariano Lupon Davao Oriental Immediately duty Desk Officer informed the duty duty Traffic Investigator PSMS Kristian Leigh R Austria to verify the said report Around 11 30 pm of the same date responding personnel from this office arrived at the accident place and conducted ocular investigation wherein there were two vehicles were involved in a Road crash collision transpired at around 09 30 pm of the same date Purok Linaw Don Mariano Marco Lupon Davao Oriental involving Vehicle 1 Suzuki Multicab pick up color green for registration owned and driven by Michael Maglangit Chatto legal age single resident of Purok Kauswagan Brgy Mapawa Maragusan Davao de Oro holder of drivers license number L01 22 304806 valid until 2027 02 21 Vehicle 2 Honda XRM 125 color red bearing plate no 5666 YU driven by Edwardo Brao legal age married resident of Purok Dahlia Sitio Pangyan Don Mariano Mmarcos Lupon Davao Oriental Initial investigation revealed that while both vehicles were travelling opposite direction V1 going to Maragusan upon reaching at the above mentioned place of accident collided at V2 Due to impact V2 swerved on the road which resulted to injury its driver and damaged to V 1 and V 2 Driver of V 2 was brought to DOPH Mati while the two vehicles together with the driver of V1 were brought to this office for proper disposition

narrative: At around 06 35 pm of November 12 2024 a call from MDRRMO Lupon was received by this office informing that there was an alleged Road Crash collision transpired at National Highway of Brgy Cocornon Lupon Davao Oriental Immediately duty Desk Officer informed the duty Patrollers together with the duty Traffic Investigator to respond the said report Around 06 37 pm of the same date responding personnel from this office arrived place of accident and conducted ocular investigation wherein there were two vehicles were involved in a Road crash collision transpired at 06 30 pm of the same date at the National Highway of Purok San Francisco 2 Brgy Cocornon Lupon Davao Oriental involving Vehicle 1 Road Grader owned by the Provincial Government of Davao Oriental driven by James Valerio Tejano 44 years old Filipino married holder of a drivers license number L07 08 00 1246 valid until 2029 07 13 a resident of Purok Banganga 2 Brgy Corporacion Lupon Davao Oriental and Vehicle 2 Honda XRM 125 bearing plate number L720AG color Black 2022 model with Engine number KPYV1EO16006 Chassis number KPYV1016050 with Official Receipt number 112824000005433 dated 10 04 2024 with Certificate of Registration number 46153374 1 dated 10 10 2022 owned by Louie Lopez Roxas a resident of Townsite Lupon Davao Oriental driven by Jake Lore Lugatiman Filipino married private employee at EMCOR Lupon holder of a driver s license number L07 02 032152 valid until 2032 08 19 a resident of Adelfa St Don Louis Village Central Mati City Davao Orienatal Initial investigation revealed that both vehicles were travelling at the same direction from Municipality of San Isidro Davao Oriental upon reaching at the National Highway of Purok San Francisco 1 Brgy Cocornon this Municipality V 2 collided at V 1 hitting at the rear portion of V 1 Further investigation revealed that the driver of V 2 was not able to see V 1 since V 1 has no reflector or lights and as a result V 2 collided at V 1 Driver of V 2 was brought to DOPH Lupon by the MDRRMO personnel but pronounced Dead on Arrival at 06 45 pm of November 12 2024 by his attending physician Dr Ferdinand R Araunie The victim is now at the cadaver holding area of Lupon while the driver of V 1 together with the vehicles involved were now at this office for proper disposition

dispatched and proceeded at the abovementioned under the supervision of PCPT JOEFFRE Q NARIDO OIC to verify the veracity of the report and conducted a Road Crash investigation Road Crash investigation Llyod Quinal Concepcion DOB November 11 11988 36 years old live in driver and resident of Purok 2 Barangay Poblacion Governor Generoso Davao Oriental and holder of Driver s License number LO2 16 000681V1 together with his two 2 passenger namely Kareen Tanzo Carmelotes DOB April 28 1982 42 years old live in Non Uniform Personnel NUP and his daughter Kelly Nicole Carmelotes Balesteros August 30 narrative: that at about 9 00 AM on November 17 2024 a vehicular accident transpired along National Highway of Brgy Lucod of this Municipality involving two vehicles described as follows V1 RUSI 150 color blue driven by Alex Esperituso 20 years old male single a resident of Purok Daisy Barangay Kinablangan Baganga Davao Oriental V2 Honda Bigbike color black with temporary plate 1303 1459191 driven by James Escosora of legal age male married Filipino Entrepreneur and a resident of Purok Mabua San Victor Baganga Davao Oriental Investigation also revealed that prior to the incident both vehicles were traveling the National Highway of Barangay Lucod of this Municipality from the South heading North area wherein V1 was ahead of V2 while occupying the inner fast lane portion and upon reaching the place of incident V1 make a quick left turn V2 tried to avoid V1 from direct contact but was unable to manage the same and hit V1 on the left side portion As a result V1 driver was thrown for about ten 10 meters away from the probable point of impact and sustained serious injuries in different parts of his body and was brought by the responding MDRRMO Baganga personnel Baganga Municipal Hospital

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO MULTIPLE DAMAGE TO PROPERTY - RPC Art 365
narrative: A concern citizen called through the hotline number of this station reporting a vehicular accident at Purok 18 Brgy Central Manay Davao Oriental In connection to blotter entry number 2024 11 4030 team led by PEMS Melchor B Molina together with the assigned patrollers at the place of incident responded to verify the veracity of the said report In connection to blotter entry number 2024 11 4031 same team returned station with initial investigation and revealed that at about 2 00 PM November 17 2024 a certain Roger Libres Bajan 33 years old single laborer and a resident of Purok Buhangin Brgy Central Tarragona Davao Oriental was driving his honda XRM 125 color black without plate number attached engine number KPYT0E003866 and Chassis number KPYT0003889 referred to as V1 said driver has no driver s license and traversing the national highway bound to Municipality of Caraga and upon reaching Purok 18 Brgy Central Manay accidentally bumped on a Honda wave 110 color black and red bearing temporary plate number 1101 40834 withour OR CR referred to as V2 driven by Richard Taming Bugsad 37 years old single driver and a resident of Crossing Bagsak Brgy Central Manay Davao Oriental a holder of professional driver s license with restrictions 1 2 3 that expires on September 2 2026 at Purok 18 Brgy Central Accordingly V2 had parked from the same direction and suddenly crossed the said road going to the opposite direction without any precaution V1 driver and his back rider Cris Angelo Laugo sustained minor injuries while V2 driver and his back riders Matet Cabugoy Udtohan live in partner also sustained minor injuries and their son John Mark Balanay that has injuries at his head and body was rushed to Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital Manay for medication Both V1 and V2 was brought to this station for further investigation but later release as per request of both party and the manifested that they are no longer interested to file charges against each other and will go to the Barangay for mediation Case referred to the Barangay

damage to V 1 and V 2 Driver of vehicle 2 was brought to DOPH Lupon by the MDRRMO personnel of Lupon while vehicles involved together with the driver of vehicle 1 were brought to this office for proper disposition RE ENTRY NO 202412 2020 202412 2021 BRIAN RAZONABLE AND SANCHO G COSTAN JR CAME TO THIS OFFICE WITH AN AMICABLE SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT FROM THE OFFICE OF THE PUNONG BARANGAY IN BARANGAY CASE NO 2024 037 FOR AMICABLE SETTLEMENT VEHICULAR ACCIDENT STATING THEREIN THAT THEY WERE AMICABLY SETTLED SIGNED BY BOTH PARTIES BARANGAY KAGAWAD ON DUTY AND PUNONG BARANGAY YVONNE ALONZO IN THIS CONNECTION ONE 1 UNIT MOTORCYCLE SUZUKI RAIDER AND ONE TRICYCLE WERE RELEASED FROM POLICE CUSTODY AND PROPERLY RECEIVED BY THE OWNER PER THEIR SIGNATURE AFFIXED HEREIN

narrative: A concerned citizen called through the hotline of this station reporting on a road crash incident at Purok 13 Brgy Central Manay Davao Oriental In connection to blotter entry number 2024 12 4055 mobile patrollers of Brgy Central Manay Davao Oriental led by PEMS Melchor Molina proceeded to the reported place to verify the report In connection to blotter entry number 2024 12 4056 same team reported at this station with an initial investigation and revealed that at about 5 45 PM December 6 2024 Rey Acera Fernandez 42 years old December 2 1982 male married teacher and a resident of Bilawan 1 Mati City a holder of Non Professional Driver s License with DL Codes A A1 with Engine Number 1NRX166549 and Chassis Number PA1B19F35H4033452 and Certificate of Registration no 002893124 dated July 27 2023 was driving his White Toyota Vios bearing plate number NBY 6975 and traversing the National Highway bound to Mati City and upon reaching Purok 18 Brgy Central Manay Davao Oriental a certain Geraldino Paguyan Ramos 78 years old married jobless and a resident of Purok 13 Brgy Central Manay crossed the said four lane highway without any precautions that resulted to the above named driver to bumped the said victim Accordingly said driver had saw the victim from the opposite lane that was about to cross and when he applied break in order to give way to the victim he victim had also stopped prompting the said driver to continue driving and did not noticed that the victim had also crossed The victim was hit at his buttock and fall down to the cemented road and sustain minor injuries Furthermore Renato Masagnong Ramos 50 years old married and a resident of the same address the son of the victim who assisted him manifested that they will not file any charges to the above named driver and only requested that the medication of his father will shouldered by the said driver For record

narrative: At about 5 50 PM of December 17 2024 a concerned citizen called up this station thru hotline number and reported that there was a vehicular accident transpired at the National Highway Sitio Paopagon Brgy Salingcomot Baganga Davao Oriental Acted on the said report Mobile patrollers led by PMSg Daniel B Flores together with PCpl Jay G Daclan duty investigator were directed to proceed at the place of incident to verify the veracity of the report and render police assistance Investigation revealed that there were two 2 single motorcycles and its respective drivers were involved and descibed as follows a V1 Blue Matte Blue YAMAHA Mio AEROX BRW4 single MC with plate no L245LB Driver of V1 JOHN MARVIN GUEVARA LASTRADO more or less 34 years old male Filipino Public School Teacher and a resident of Embarkadero St Brgy Central Baganga Davao Oriental b V2 Blue KYMCO Commuter single motorcycle with plate no 915LCP Driver of V2 ROLLY CALIG ONAN MAPANDO 58 years old live in farmer and a resident of Sitio Sakungan Brgy Manorigao Caraga Davao Oriental together with his backride ELDITO GAVINO TOYONGAN 48 years old single farmer and a resident of Sitio Sakungan Brgy Manorigao Caraga Davao Oriental Investigation revealed that the driver of V1 was traversing the national highway from Panjugan Elementary School going to Brgy Central of this municipality while V2 was coming from Brgy Central going to Brgy Salingcomot all of this municipality and both vehicles were coming from opposite directions and upon reaching the place of incident V2 suddenly changed lane and follows a V1 Flare Red MG MG5 1 5L CORE MT sedan with Plate No LAN7655 Driver of V1 KRISTIE LYN FLORES MONDAY legal age female Filipino Area Supervisor of Palawan Pawnshop and a resident of Prk Centro San Victor Baganga Davao Oriental b V2 White RUSI Flex125i single motorcycle Driver of V2 MYCA MATAMPAY ORFANEL legal age female Filipino public school teacher and a resident of Sitio Coog Brgy Mahan ub Baganga Davao Oriental together with her backride ROSEMALYN MANDUYAN DELOTE legal age female Filipino public school teacher and a resident of Sitio Coog Brgy Mahan ub Baganga Davao Oriental ROY ENGLISA OIC of this station together with personnel from MDRRMO Tarragona responded to conduct investigation and ocular inspection of the said report 3 Initial investigation conducted by this office revealed that at about 8 50 AM of December 24 2024 referred to as V 1 one 1 unit NISSAN NV350 URBAN color color white AMBULANCE with conduction sticker V644 owned by Caraga Municipal Health Center Caraga Davao Oriental without OR CR presented driven by Felix Palma Gambong 62 years old married and resident of Purok Yellow Bell Brgy Poblacion Caraga Davao Oriental and possessor of Driver s license number L02 02 163137 with code No A A1 B B1 B2 that will expired on May 30 2032 together with two 2 passengers in the person of Jay Palma and one 1 patient named Mary Joy Lagbuca both residents of Poblacion Caraga Davao Oriental traversing from Municipality of Caraga going to Davao Oriental Provincial Medical Center Mati City while referred to as V 2 One 1 unit Trike Bao Bao RE Badja vehicle color blue bearing plate number L546DL without OR CR presented driven by Jesrel Sumaliling legal age common law husband and a resident of New Manay Maragusan Davao De Oro together with four 4 passengers namely Miraflor Mandabon legal age common law wife and three 3 daughters namely Meka Hutea Mandabon Sumaliling 7 years old Precious Reighn Mandabon Sumaliling 3 years old and Shine Merrine Mandabon Sumaliling 6 years old traversing an opposite direction from Mati City going to Municipality of Manay and upon reaching at aforesaid place both vehicles were met an accident that went to head on collision which resulting injuries to the passengers and damage to property of both vehicles During the course of investigation it appears that the driver of V 1 was counter flowed his driven vehicle to opposite lane Thus the accident happened when V 1 hit the approaching trike bao bao from opposite lane 4 Further the patient of the said ambulance was immediately ferried by the ambulance of Tarragona while the passengers of trike were also ferried by another ambulance of Tarragona and brought to Davao Oriental Provincial Medical Center for immediate medication Both vehicles were brought to this office and the driver of the said ambulance for proper disposition 5 For information and further request acknowledge Progress Report to follow Investigator on case PSSg Arnold L Quibo 09156800495

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO DAMAGE TO PROPERTY - RPC Art 365
narrative: Please be informed that at around 09 17 pm of December 25 2024 a call was received by this office from MDRRMO dispatched team informing that there was an alleged Road Crash incident transpired at Purok Mabuhay Brgy Bagumbayan Lupon Davao Oriental Immediately duty Desk Officer informed the duty Patrollers together with the duty Traffic Investigator PSMS Kristian Leigh R Austria to respond the report Around 09 18 PM of the same date responding personnel from this office arrived at the scene and conducted ocular investigation wherein the incident transpired at around 07 15 PM of the same date and the involved vehicles were One veh 1 Motostar with side car color red with temporary plate number 1101 166915 without pertinent documents presented owned and driven by Cito Avila Catog 56 yo Filipino widower farmer unlicensed a resident of Purok 10 Brgy Libudon City of Mati and One veh 2 Suzuki raider FI MC with plate number 548 LVX color white and black driven by Gabriel Davis Diola 26 yo Fiipinol single without pertinent documents presented to include driver s license a resident of Purok Banganga 2 Brgy Ccorporacion Lupon Davao Oriental Initial investigation revealed that both vehicles were traversing the National Highway from Brgy Corporacion proper heading towards Poblacion Lupon upon reaching at the above mentioned place of incident the two vehicles collided Due to impact veh 1 toppled over and veh 2 swerved on the road which causes injury to its driver and damage to the vehicle Further investigation revealed that the driver of veh 1 only uses a flashlight while he was driving his vehicle and no reflectorize sticker was attach on it as a result the driver of veh 2 was not able to see veh 1 and he collided at veh 1 hiiting the side wheel Drivers were brought to DOPH Lupon by the MDRRMO Lupon personnel while involved vehicles were brought to this office for proper disposition

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: A cellphone call received by this station informing that a vehicular accident transpired along the Pres Diosdado Macapagal national highway of Brgy Puntalinao Banaybanay Davao Oriental Upon receipt mobile patroller led by Traffic Investigator PSSG Vicente P Redillas Jr together with Pssg Raffy Pugosa and Pcpl Kristan Mar Albarido proceeded at the aforesaid place to conduct ocular and traffic investigation It disclosed that on the stated time and date Both vehicles are traversing in intersection angle direction from LuPon Davao Oriental heading toward Pantukan Davao DeOro Upon reaching at the place of accident particularly at Purok Walingwaling Brgy Puntalinao this municipality place of accident V1 slowly execute left turn heading toward brgy Puntalinao proper Suddenly V2 from rightside portion without precautionary measure accidentally hit bumped V1 from leftside portion As a result mc tumbled down to cemented pavement of the road and incurred damages then V2 driver suffer injury in different parts of his body abrasion at stomach and pain in thigh together with his onboard rider identified as One 1 Jerome Lahaylàhay Aclidan also suffer injuries in different parts of his body Abulse wound in left leg abrasion in left knee left foot right elbow Immediately brought by responding MDRRMD personnel to DOPH Lupon Davao Oriental for medical examination While v1 driver suffer minor in left knee All vehicles are now under the custody of this station for disposition Investigator on Case PSsg Vicente Redillas Jr Contact no 09121953281

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: A cellphone call received by this station informing that a vehicular accident transpired along the Pres Diosdado Macapagal national highway of Brgy Pintatagan Banaybanay Davao Oriental Upon receipt Mobile patroller led by Traffic Investigator PSSG Vicente P Redillas Jr onboard on Hilux patrol car Driven by Pssg Raffy Pugosa together with Pcpl Kristan Mar Albarido proceeded at the aforesaid place to conduct ocular and traffic investigation It disclosed that on the stated time and date Trike is traversing in a direction from Tagum City heading toward Mati City Davao Oriental Upon reaching at the place of accident particularly at Purok 2 welcome park of Brgy Pintatagan this municipality place of accident TRIKE is in good running condition suddenly pedestrian identified as One 1 John Roxas of legal age male single and a resident of Purok 1 housing Barangay Puntalinao Banaybanay Davao Oriental without precautionary measure walk across the road then accidentally hit bumped by the approaching trike As a in result pedestrian fell into cemented pavement of the road and suffer injury in different parts of his body Bumped a pedestrian accident Immediately brought by responding BDRRMD personnel to DDOPH Pantukan Davao De Oro for medical examination Investigator on Case PSsg Vicente Redillas Jr Contact no 09121953281

narrative: Please be informed that at around 06 22 pm of December 25 2024 a call was received by this office from MDRRMO dispatched team informing that there was an alleged Road Crash incident transpired at Purok Mabuhay Brgy Bagumbayan Lupon Davao Oriental Immediately duty Desk Officer informed the duty Patrollers together with the duty Traffic Investigator PSMS Kristian Leigh R Austria to respond the report Around 06 23 PM of the same date responding personnel from this office arrived place of incident and conducted ocular investigation wherein the involved vehicle were One Veh 1 Honda TMX motorcycle color red without plate number with Engine number KSWWOE157634 Chassis number KSWW01577077 driven by Simeon Luna Tapulgo unlicensed driver 42 years old Filipino married private employee with his backrider Rammil Malinao Joseph 54 years old Filipino plumber both residents of Purok Malinawon Brgy Ilangay Lupon Davao Oriental and One Veh 2 Kawasaki TC bearing plate number 4835 LV with body number L 0690 Engine number DUZWDL09574 Chassis number MD2A18AZ5DWL39749 2013 model with Certificate of Registration number 156764484 dated 09 19 2013 Official receipt number 1603274934 dated 05 24 2019 owned by Mercurion sayon Ugsimar a resident of Clado Subdivision Brgy Poblacion Lupon Davao Oriental driven by Elisio Teves Paypa 37 yo Filipino married unlicensed a resident of Purok San Miguel 1 Brgy Corporacion Llupon Davao Oriental Initial investigation revealed that both vehicles were running in an opposite direction veh 1 was traversing from Purok Recaño Brgy Bagumbayan heading towards Brgy Poblacion and veh 2 traversing from Brgy Poblacion heading towards Brgy Bagumbayan upon reaching at the above mentioned place of incident while veh 2 was about to maneuver left turn collided at veh 1 Further investigation revealed that veh 1 has a defective headlight and he was not notice by the driver of veh 2 and due to impact backrider of veh 1 was thrown on the road OWNER

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: RIR PHYSICAL INJURY That at around 8 00 in the morning on December 26 2024 patroller this station conducted patrolling in their area of responsibility and during their duties and responsibilities At about 9 15 in the morning on December 26 2024 they caught the vehicular incident in the area thereat they called this station through One Prime Radio and informed this station of the incident that transpired Acted on the report PSMS Tedoro L Blaya duty investigator immediately left this station and proceeded to the place of the incident to conduct an initial investigation Initial investigation disclosed that MC1 Pacifico T Limbadan 80 years old male and a resident of P 8 Brgy Tibanban Governor Generoso Davao Oriental driven a Electric Generated E Bike and MC2 Evan Rico O Pormentero 39 years old male the driver and his passenger Gina Mae Pormentero 38 years old both resident of P Acacia Upper Tibanban of this municipality In addition during the investigation revealed that both MC were traveling in the same direction going to Brgy Tibanban proper upon reaching the National Highway of P 8 Brgy Tibanban the MC1 executed U turn direction and when the driver of MC2 learned the execution of MC1 immediately applied a brake marking sked mark up to 5 meters but still accidentally bumped the left side of MC 1 As a result of the incident both drivers and passengers of MC 2 sustained injuries and were subsequently brought to Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital Governor Generoso for medication while both motorcycles incurred light damages and were under the custody of Governor Generoso MPS During the investigation both drivers and motorcycles had no driver s license and no documents presented during the investigation Moreover during the follow up investigation in the hospital both parties agreed that the case would refer to the barangay for amicable settlement and found out that they are relatives Investigator on case PSMS Teodoro L Blaya 0978000425

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: 1 Please be informed that at about 6 10 AM of December 30 2024 a Dispatch coming from One prime Radio was called that there was a vehicular accident transpired in front of DIY Building Brgy Saoquigue Baganga Davao Oriental 2 Immediately PNP personnel of this station led by PSSg Archibald Bantayan and PSSg Daryl B Abarico Traffic Investigator left this station bound to the said place of incident to conduct ocular investigation 3 Investigation conducted disclosed that at about 6 00 PM on December 30 2024 a vehicular accident transpired along National Highway of Brgy Saoquigue of this Municipality involving two vehicles described as follows V1 Driver RODILO MAGANDAG BECERA 44 years old male married Filipino Driver and a resident of Sittio Masao Brgy Dapnan Baganga Davao Oriental with License No LO1 20 002383 MV Bajaj CT 100 Color black temporary plate number 11101 299306 V2 Driver NOMER CESAR LINSAG PANG legal age male married filipino and a resident of Barangay Mahan ub Baganga Davao Oriental with license No LO1 20 012835 MV XRM 125 color black with no plate number attached 4 Initial investigation conducted by this office disclosed that prior to the incident both vehicles were traveling the National Highway of Barangay Saoquigue of this Municipality from the South heading North area wherein V1 was ahead of V2 while occupying the outer slow lane portion and upon reaching the place of incident V2 suddenly bump the back portion of V1 causing it to almost lost control while V2 driver fell down and due to the impact of the bump V2 driver sustained injuries and was immediately responded by the MDRRMO and brought to Baganga Awuyon Hospital while a passenger of V1 was also brought to the hospital and V1 driver did not sustained any injuries 5 Further both parties involved preferred and agreed for an amicable settlement and was refer to Barangay Saoquigue 6 Investigator on case PSSg Daryl B Abarico 09389902963

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: Initial investigation conducted revealed that MC is traversing in a direction from Davao City heading towards to Mati City Davao Oriental Upon reaching at Pres Diosdado Macapagal National Highway of Purok 4 Barangay San Vicente Banaybanay Davao Oriental The driver lost her handle bar and swerve to right side of the road As a result both driver and passenger of the MC was stumble down to the pavement of the road and sustained injuries on their different parts of their body and immediately rescued by banaybanay mdrrmo Vehicle involved were now under the custody of this station for proper disposition

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO DAMAGE TO PROPERTY - RPC Art 365
narrative: At about 11 15 AM of December 30 2024 a phone call from a concerned citizen received by the station informing that a vehicular Davao Oriental accident transpired along the national highway of Punta Abejod Brgy Baon San Isidro Davao Oriental Upon receipt personnel of this station onboard mobile number 748 led by PSSG Cayetano Diaz Jr and PCPl John Vincent Fuñe immediately prceeded at the aforesaid place to conduct ocular and initial traffic investigation At about 11 10am dated December 30 2024 investigation disclosed based on the personal accounts of the witness former Brgy Kagawad of Brgy Cambaleon Hn Hermenigildo Rosilio Cabatuan that V1 Yamaha Mio Souli 125 motorcycle color violet with temporary plate nr 1101 0726859 attached driven by a certain D1 Manual JJaya Apao 76 years old male married retiree driver s license official receipt and certificate of registration were not yet presented with onboard Angelina Membrano Apao wife 73 years old female married retiree and both residents of Prk 8 Tibanban Governor Generoso Davao Oriental that while traversing from Governor Generoso Davao Oriental upon freaching that national highway of Punta Abejod Brgy Baon San Isidro Davao Oriental they stopped for awhile and suddenly turned left meanwhile traversing motorcycle from Brgy Cambaleon D2 Suzuki Raider 125 color red with plate no L701 JS attached driven by a certain D2 Rynan Gumandoy Bernaldez 40 years old male married construction worker with driver s license no L07 24 002677 that expires on December 21 2028 while Official Receipt and Certificate of Registration were not yet presented with onboard Leizel Montizo Alegro wife 40 years old female married social wworker and Ryhannalie Kaith Bernaldez daughter 1 year old all residents of Prk 2 Brgy Cambaleon San Isidro Davao Oriental bound to Brgy Batobato swerved to the opposite lade to evade V1 from colliding unfortunately V1 continued to move forward thus they collided at the opposite inner lane and both fell down to the concrete road Drivers and back riders were unable to wear helmets As a result both drivers and back riders sustain damages to the different parts of their bodies while both motorcycles incurred an undermined cost of damages Immediately personnel from MDRRM San Isidro responded to the accident and all involved individuals were now under the custody of this station for proper disposition Progress Report will follow IOC PSSg Cayetano Diaz Jr Cp nr 09514047782 and PCPl John Vincent Fuñe CP nr 09663560287 Progress Report 1 Reference Spot Report on Vehicular Accident dated December 30 2024 2 In connection with the above reference the victim complainant duly represented by Mr Basilio V Adlawan Jr reached an Amicable Settlement with the respondent Rynan G Bernaldez The victim side did not file a complaint and preferred to repair each other s vehicle separately and so with the medical

offense: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO MULTIPLE PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
narrative: A concerned citizen reported at this station through our hotline a vehicular accident transpired at Sitio Palma Brgy Central Manay Davao Oriental In connection to blotter entry number 2024 12 4089 mobile patroller led by PEMS Melchor Molina together with PSMS Joselito M Gomera duty investigator proceeded to the reported place to verify the veracity of the report In connection to t he preceeding entries same team returned station and with Initial investigation conducted revealed that at about 2 00 PM December 31 2024 Romerico Ongcay Maguinsawan 70 years old DOB Nov 4 1954 married driver and a resident of Sitio Paradahan Brgy San Ignacio Manay Davao Oriental who has no driver s license and driving his red Honda TMX 155 motorcyle without plate number attached with engine number KB505048059707E and chassis number KB505048059707 referred to as V1 together with 2 passengers and traversing the National Highway bound to Municipality of Caraga and upon reaching at a crossing of Sitio Palma Brgy Central Manay Davao Oriental above named driver turned left going to Brgy San Isidro Manay and accidentally bumped from behind by a certain Toyota Hi Ace commuter van bearing plate number NCN 7621 with engine number 1KD2666688 and chassis number JTF2T02P1650004643 with certificate of registration dated November 14 2019 and LTO OR number 2024076773 dated January 28 2021 expired OR referred to as V2 driven by Patrick Neil Monje Calo 39 years old June 6 1985 male married self employed and a resident of Purok Narra Brgy Baculin Baganga Davao Oriental a holder of Professional driver s license with DL codes B B1 B2 C D that expires on May 6 2024 with mobile phone number 09658413151 Accordingly V1 had signaled left and slowed down at the center of the highway and on the process of turning left while V2 who was at back of V1 had bumped V1 from behind causing V1 driver to lose control on the steering handle of his motorcycle and subsequently fall on the road and dragged by V2 to the shoulder of the opposite lane V1 driver and his back rider Gemma Paguio Dilam 46 years old May 31 1977 female married and a resident of Purok 3 Brgy San Isidro Manay Davao Oriental and Centula Pingot Martije 68 years old DOB August 19 1956 female married and a resident of Purok 10 Mangga Brgy San Isidro Manay sustained minor injuries and immediately brought by MDRRMC Manay Personnel to Davao Oriental Provincial Hospital Manay while V2 driver and his passenger sustained no injuries Both V1 and V2 incurred damages and brought by the responding PNP personnel to this station for further investigation Case referred to the Barangay
